When it went off the tracks and before it could go off the edge, River urged Shizu to stop and he did. When they all got out, Shizu examined the area and saw much rock cover, high rising rocks that could've been counted as small mountains, and a lot of sand. What was notable was the burn markings on some of the rocks and the remains of people whom of which looked like they were partially melted which their armor didn't seem to do much to whatever hit them.
"So, is this where ranked 99 is?" Shizu questioned River pointed in a general direction
"Over there somewhere"
"Not exactly helpful"
"I would show you, but I don't want to die early"
"Well I think I'll figure it out when I get there, let's go Sora" Shizu and Sora went down into the rock maze and carefully treaded through it...

-On the face of the largest rock mountains-

There was a white, skinny female wearing red and white boots, skirt and shirt with red hair tied In a skull hairclip sitting in a metal enforced room that had simple furniture with a map on one side and a ladder leading down in the corner. There was also a 'window hole' in the wall where she shoots out and she had a laser sniper rifle right next to her, it looks very metallic and has a nuclear symbol on the hilt.
"Ah, it's so boring!" She said as she heard bells ringing, a signal that someone is approaching. She immediately stood up and aimed to look for the intruder and saw Shizu and Sora walking through the rock terrain that was her target practice. "Ah, that must be ranked 100...They better not die quickly because I want this to last...For some reason it seems appropriate to have a white wolf with him, I guess its hunter's instincts" Then she fired.

-Back to Sora and Shizu-

While they were carefully treading the rock terrain, they saw the laser projectile coming and dodged it.
"Holy crap that laser is fast!" Sora yelled as both of them went in different directions
"At least it's better than bullets, in terms of seeing the projectile" Shizu responded as he hid from cover to cover, moving continuously.

-To Natalie (Name of ranked 99)-
"Oh my, that man is quick...Heh this is going to be interesting!" Suddenly her rifle began to charge up an attack...Then she fired a giant laser beam that was much faster than the average laser she fires.

-River-

While she was sitting on the edge of the rock face, she had her binoculars out watching the spectacle
"Getting to her is going to be a hassle, good thing those two are fast or else this would take forever" Then she looked down at the corpses "I should probably rob those corpses with whatever gear they have that's not broken"
1311111111.title: A ride through bi-polar weather

13111111111.content:
When Shizu poked his head out of his cover to get a bead on where the sniper was, he saw a bright red light from one of the rock mountains in the distance, which was a fair distance, but was still going to be tedious if he were to attack the sniper up close. "Well now I know where that sniper is...Wait that doesn't-" The second Natalie fired, Shizu saw a very fast moving, sizable continuous laser coming at him which he quickly rolled out of the way as the laser barely hit him, but with the amount of heat it emitted he was still burned from behind and his cover was completely destroyed. He moved very quickly from cover to cover to avoid the regular laser shots and rested behind a very large rock. "Damn, where the heck is Sora?" When he questioned himself he saw that the sniper had changed targets and was aiming at Sora. Well at least he knew where he was. That was when Natalie used her focused laser beam on Sora which to make is worse it was 2 consecutive shots in a row. "Crap that looks bad, Sora better have avoided that!" While thinking of an easier way to approach the sniper nest he remembered two things: His light refraction and, in theory, the ability to reflect lasers "This theory better work or I'll never be able to get near that person with that giant laser of his/her" He unsheathed his blade and went out of his cover and went into a charging position that ensure he could run while being able to move his blade to reflect projectiles.

-Natalie-

After shooting the two consecutive focused lasers, she searched for the wolf and saw that she didn't exactly kill it, but managed to incapacitate it "Okay, wolf is down, now for...Oh what do we have here?" She saw the swordsman running towards her position, although he was quite a distance away he was moving at a very fast speed that seemingly broke what a normal person can do "What the heck is that idiot doing? No matter, you'll end up worser than your wolf friend!" She fired her rifle several times at him

-Shizu-

"Okay" He thought to himself "If my blade is capable of refracting light with ease and can reflect bullets without even denting, a laser should be of the same principle...I saw the burn markings on those rocks and it seems it would be more effective on flesh if anything, but that is just an assumption" Then he saw the laser projectiles coming at him. When he got his blade into position of the lasers, he actually managed to deflect the lasers. "Theory confirmed, this blade can reflect lasers"

-Natalie-

"What the- That guy can reflect lasers?!What-... It's good that I can fight someone like this after such a long time, let's see how you like a double shot of a focused laser!" She was charging her rifle again.

-Shizu-

When he saw the laser charging he thought of this, "With how long the laser charges and with the distance between us, I need to get rid of the problem of the sniper...I hope this blade can reflect those giant lasers...I'm pretty sure I am being overconfident" Seconds before the predicted firing time, he used his sword flash and blinded the sniper. With that sudden flash the sniper's aim was thrown off and the laser ended up being shot way behind Shizu and the second one was fired, by luck, directly at Shizu. When he got his blade into position he was suddenly pushed back by the force of the laser and by continuously moving the blade in a certain angle he managed to direct the continuous laser right back at the sniper, partially taking out the rock mountain. But when it ended he hit the ground in pain as his hands and about 50% of his body had been burned by the heat of the laser. While he was on the ground he reached into his bag and brought out a syringe and injected it into himself. "That was such a bad idea..." That was when he heard wind blow furiously for a moment and someone was over him,
"It's a tie" A female voice said as Shizu blacked out

-in the mountain base-

Natalie and Shizu were lying in separate beds in the same room, both being bandaged from their injuries, but both could still talk.
"Damn you swordsman, how did you do that?" Natalie questioned
"It's called skill and the right equipment" Shizu replied
"Also having balls enough to even attempt that!"
"That to..."
"You know, as much as I hate losing, I can ignore this time since this is the first time someone had did that to me"
"Hm...Hey Natalie, mind if I make an assumption?"
"Sure, we have all the time in the world"
"Is the reason you fight, the feel of victory or accomplishment over others so you can feel good about yourself to fill an empty gap that only contains failures?"
"Partially, a little of it was for the thrill, but all of that is somehow accurate, how did you figure that out even though we are just talking for the first time?"
"The amount of power that weapon of yours have and the fact you said you hate losing, plus the massive disadvantage you had over me"
"Even with all that, I lost"
"Well, remember that there are people that are good and those who are better, and even those who are weak or have a disadvantage to one who is stronger, but when there is a will, there is a way, just use that will effectively or wait until the strong make a mistake"
"Like what you did with that laser?"
"No, that was pure theory and overconfidence" Natalie laughed after hearing that
"I can't believe I lost to that...Hey Shizu"
"Yeah?"
"After we recover, mind if we do our battle a different way?"
"Rematch?"
"No, our battle was a tie, I want to play this out a different way, for both of us to learn"
"Okay"

-1 week later-

While watching from a security-type room, River, Sora (Who's body is covered in bandages) and another woman who is in desert-type camo was watching a screen that is supposed to observe the rematch between Natalie and Shizu in different conditions. Which by the way, both of them were still wearing bandages.

The room they are fighting is a circular glass room with very reflective glass angled in different ways.
"So Natalie, why choose this type of battlefield?"
"We fought with me having a distance and range advantage against you yet we still tied. In here it tests one's ability to perception, multi-tasking, and reflexes which I assume is your specialty"
"In this place I have the advantage, mind telling me why you did this?"
"Victory is much sweeter when the one you are fighting has an advantage over you, that is why" She then pulled out her weapon which was missing some of its parts. When she pointed the gun at the ceiling she suddenly yelled "Let's dance!" And fired many lasers into the glass ceiling which reflected downwards making quite a scary sight
"Man, everyone here is crazy..." Shizu said...


Ranked #100: Natalie Creshaw
Ranked #99: Shizu Irie
Ranked #98: Joseph Steghorn
13111111111.title: Wolf and lasers

131111111111.content:
While River was driving the RV away from the Mexican border, Shizu was sitting down with Sora laying his head on his lap, which both still had bandages on.
"That was an intense match" Sora said
"That was a crazy woman would describe it better" Shizu replied "But some aspects I can admire" Then he looked over to River "So...California, eh?"
"That would be correct, oh and heed this, it would either be taken by land or by sea"
"What the heck does that mean?"
"Oh, you'll figure it out"

-What happened earlier in the glass room-

After multiple dodges by both Natalie and Shizu, he definitely had the upper hand as he at least had a form of protecting himself with his blade along with his higher movement and reflex ability while Natalie's physical abilities were impressive, it still wasn't enough as she was being pelted by her own lasers. After the match was over, Shizu ran over to her and injected something to numb the pain. Although despite being hit with so many lasers, Natalie was still alive and conscious and she said this, "Don't worry about me, you won, I lost...Besides, the lasers are weaker when in automatic mode...Also, I won't die this easily, not until I am satisfied with myself...and Shizu"
"What?"
"After you become #1, fight me again so the victory would be even sweeter"
"Well...I'll do my best to do that"

-And now to the present-

Shizu sighed, "There are all kinds of people and it takes all kinds, I wonder what the next person would bring"

-The road to California beach-

Well, they are in California, but unfortunately for them there were a bunch of big guys hitting on River and she wasn't amused
"Come on pretty lady, leave that guy with his dog and be with us" Was an example of what these guys were saying, up until one of them touched her and the fury of her was unleashed in the scariest way possible. After seeing the unconscious big guys on the ground, Shizu just said
"I question how you aren't ranked" and then Sora said
"Scary..." While hiding behind Shizu
"Come on guys, I'm not that scary!" River said, but then both of them went back inside of the RV which peeved River a little bit.

-The beach-

"River?"
"Yes?"
"It's one thing to bring us to the beach to fight...But it's another thing to make me wear only swim trunks!" Shizu was wearing black swim trunks, but still had his sheathed sword and backpack on him while River was wearing a brown bikini, but still had her strapped bag on and rapier with her
"We stick out like a sore thumb if we wore our clothing out in this heat on the beach!"
"Oh like a white wolf with a sheathed sword strapped on, a man with a sheathed sword and backpack, and a woman with a rapier and strapped bag isn't suspicious already"
"Not the point!"
"Wait are you sure number 98 is even here or is this an excuse to go swimming?"
"Couriers don't lie about ranked people's location!"
"Jeez, what is this a beach episode in an anime?"
"Nope, needs more fan-service" She reached into her bag and pulled out pictures of...well if you knew what fan-service meant, you would know what this is
"When did you-"
"Took it while you were out getting swim clothing"
"Wait" Sora said "I was with you when Shizu went out, went did you take pictures?"
"You were busy looking at female canines walking by to notice"
"..." Sora went silent after that
"I question why you did that, are you going to sell those pictures to fellow couriers who are perverts?"
"Maybe..."
"You know I can take those words in two ways right?"

-Later on -
In a nutshell, River screwed around, Sora went off to do whatever he did, and Shizu tried to figure out where number 98 was...Which he never got the description of what he looked like. Although he didn't search long he decided to go to a place which wasn't populated with some many people. After going to a certain spot on the beach he spotted someone coming out of the ocean carrying a net full of misc. items. When Shizu went to talk to him he saw that he was about an average-heighted person with a slight build, brown medium-length hair, black eyes and was white. He was also wearing a green and brown military-like uniform with a rebreather.
"Hey sir, do you happen to know wh-" The man stopped him talking mid-way
"Before talking to someone, get to know them first, especially if its only two of us here. State your name"
"Shizu Irie"
"Joseph Steghorn is the name, so what business do you have over here?"
"I'm looking for ranked 98, you know who he is?" Joseph suddenly dropped the net full of items "Who's asking?"
"I'm ranked 99 and-" Joseph stopped him again
"Okay, that's good, there isn't many civilians around us so I assume we're safe"
"So you're-"
"Yes. Now" He walked more inland and reached into the sand and pulled out a flechette gun "State your specialty and abilities and I'll state mine"
"Master swordsman, capable of projectile reflection and light refraction. Also higher movement and reflexes"
"Ex-soldier, specialist in underwater combat and close-range combatant. State your ability to swim or not"
"______"
"Okay, understood"
131111111111.title: The crazy and the furious

1311111111111.content:
He reached into his pocket and pulled out a rebreather "Now, before I give you this, answer my question, how good at you at swimming?"
"Let's just say, you either sink or swim, considering that you are seeing me now means I'm not at the bottom of the ocean" Joseph handed him the rebreather
"Right now, you aren't, after you fight me you may end up at the bottom of the sea" Both of them jumped into the water and headed out to sea at a fair distance from the shore if something happened. When they were at a fair distance, Joseph said his final words before fighting "You ready?"
"If I wasn't, I wouldn't be here" Then both of them dived underwater a fair distance and then the did battle.

While they were fighting, Shizu took notes on how Joseph was currently fighting as this was his first time fighting underwater. From what he can see, Joseph has a simple attack pattern yet his movements are incredibly fluid, free, and seemingly unrestrained compared to what people are supposed to be when they are swimming underwater. That would mean that Joseph has a body that is tempered specifically for water combat and one of the advantages he has would be free-movement while the water reduces Shizu's movement speed. For a while now it was a stand-still as Joseph was just shooting and Shizu was blocking, but that was when Joseph pulled out a diving knife and he had charged at high speed at Shizu, which one would argue that he was a speeding bullet, and had knocked him back hard. When Shizu quickly recovered, Joseph had went into for a close-combat blade fight. Shizu was mostly at the defensive as even when he manages to break Joseph's defense, he always manages to avoid him with ease and continue on with a slashing onslaught. Then it got even worse when Joseph pulled back and started doing consecutive diving charges.

-Sora-

While he was sniffing out Shizu's scent, it had led him to the area of the beach that was pretty much deserted and when he found the backpack and looked out to sea, he just said this, "Great, he's having a fight out at sea...well I'll wait until he arrives" Then he wrapped his body around Shizu's backpack and took a nap

-River-

She was with 2 fellow couriers, both male, and they were trading, selling, buying photos from each other.
"So" One of the couriers say "For these 3 photos I'll give you 5 of these"
"Deal" River said as she took the photos
"Hm, for 8 of these photos I'll hand you 4 of these" The other courier said
"Hey, that seems to be an unfair exchange"
"Quite the contrary, in equivalent exchange it goes like this, these 8 photos total a number of 8 women, these 4 photos total a number of 8 men, you get it?"
"You guys and your exchange crap, okay we all good?"
"Yep"
"Yes we are" Then all of the couriers finished their deal and went back to whatever they did

-Shizu-

Although it seems like Joseph was winning by a long-shot, something didn't settle right with him, "Hm, something seems off, this person doesn't seem to be trying as much as I thought he would, but if I continue like this, isn't he going to hit rock bottom?" When he was charging yet again, he noticed the coral reef at the bottom of them "What?! Oh crap I screwed up, wait didn't this guy-" Although you can't see it, Shizu smiled as he used his sword flash to blind Joseph while he was in the middle of his charge. When he got close, Shizu used the momentum of his own attack and threw him down to the corral reef below which knocked him out cold. The match was over.

When Shizu was dragging Joseph out, Sora's ears perked up and he came to assist/ ask what happened
"What happened? Did you win?"
"I'm cut up, fully conscious, and I have an unconscious man with me, do the math"
"Okay then, congratulations, now if you'll excuse me I'll be doing something" Sora ran off to do something as Shizu set Joseph down, pulled out a syringe, and inserted it into his neck. After a little bit of time, he regained consciousness.
"Ah, it appears you have bested me at my own game, well done"
"You did well, also"
"You observed me that much eh? Being able to figure out the weakness in my attack pattern and was good enough to figure out what your opponent and thinking and catch them while their guard is down...You'll make an excellent...No...You are a true fighter"
"By the way, can I say something?"
"Go ahead, you earned it"
"By how you are an ex-soldier, the way you fight underwater and the items you were carrying beforehand, I'm guessing you are fighting for nothing, maybe the people, but that's not it"
"That's right, that's not it at all, the real reason I fight is because when I was younger I didn't make that many friends because if my constant moving and even when I joined the military, I couldn't make friends, well that's mainly because of that incident, but that 's another time. You know how the battling 101 is still considering an attack force? Well, I want to be apart of that, to fight with my comrades in arms, to connect with them, to be with them, to die with them. That is my purpose to fight, so I can feel what a friendship feels like among people that won't go down easily"
"Huh, interesting"
"Sorry if I droned out for to long"
"No, its okay, that story actually coincides with my purpose for fighting" Shizu brought a hand out "Joseph Steghorn, it would be a pleasure to fight alongside you in the heat of battle"
"When that day comes, it will be a glorious day to die. Shizu Irie" Joseph responded as he shaked hands of Shizu. Then they sent each other off with a salute. Shizu picked up his backpack and went back to the RV.

When he entered the RV he saw River sitting at the table looking at...questionable pictures. She was surprised by Shizu's entrance and accidentally scrambled her pictures which one landed on the floor. Before she could pick it up, Shizu caught it and he looked at the picture with a blank face "River..."
"Yes?" She questioned nervously
"If I bring a male companion over in this RV, what the heck is going to go through your mind?"
"Uh..." Then suddenly Sora came bursting in at that moment, holding something in his mouth
"Hey Shizu, guess what?"
"What?"
"You know that guy you fought at the beach?"
"Of course, I just fought him and got to know him, why? And what's in your mouth?" Sora dropped the item from his mouth and onto the ground. When he picked it up it was a dog-tag and already he knew what it meant which brought a smile to his face...

-Later-

Shizu was driving while River was checking things on her cellphone
"How are our funds?" Shizu questioned
"It is ridiculously high, I could go stereotypically gold-digger right now and we still have money left"
"So, where are we headed next?"
"Las Vegas" Then Shizu suddenly hit the breaks
"River, you better not gamble there!"
"I'm not! Who do you take me for?"
"..." Shizu continued driving toward their next destination.

Ranked #99: Joseph Steghorn
Ranked #98: Shizu Irie
Ranked #97. Marco Sand
Ranked #96. Franco Gambit
1311111111111.title: Wolf and water

13111111111111.content:
-While on the ride to Vegas-

There was a long awkward silence between River and Shizu as they haven't said a word after they left the city they were at. Sora began speaking to River,
"Hey what happened?" River lowered her head down and tipped her hat down
"An embarrassing situation..."
"What kind of situation?"
"He saw something that he shouldn't have" Then Sora looked at Shizu
"Shizu you sly dog!"
"Hm? What are you talking about?"
"Did you see River naked while changing or something?" The reactions of both Shizu and River were pretty much justified
"What?!" Shizu questioned
"No, it was nothing like that!" River replied
"With those reactions I would assume you did" Sora said with a sly grin
"Quit grinning like that" Shizu said blankly
"Why did you even say that?" River questioned
"Well, what else would it be" Suddenly River had an embarrassed face and Shizu's face went blank as nothing else was said on the ride to Vegas.
"...What did I do?"

-Las Vegas motherfu- -

When they rode into Las Vegas, it wasn't even 5 minutes in after they stopped to restock on certain supplies where they were ambushed by criminals. Of course they were taken out easily and River looted them for anything valuable which..."These guys don't have crap on them!"
"Well, what did you expect for them to be, walking armories?" Shizu questioned as he looked around the place "Quite crowded isn't it?"
"If you want to know where your next match, it's at the Luck Roulette casino" He took in the scenery and just shook his head
"River"
"Yes?"
"You're driving"

-Luck Roulette Casino-

After parking the RV and leaving River behind to defend the vehicle from thieves, Shizu and Sora were about to go through the casino doors when one of the guards approached them, "Sorry, no animals allowed"
"Sorry Sora, rules are rules"
"Eh, it's okay, we could've just assumed that" After he spoke the security guard was baffled, but then a static sound was heard from his ear-piece and someone said something.
"Hold on...According to my superior, both of you can enter" Both of the entered the Casino and then asked the employees where their next fight was.

-Security room-

Marco Sand (ranked 97, had an average height, slight build, shaved black hair, brown eyes, darkened skin and was wearing a rolled up white long-sleeve T-shirt that was splattered with blood, blue jeans, and leather gloves) Was observing the security camera's and the minute Shizu had gone out of his RV, the camera's had scanned him and had alerted Marco to the appearance of ranked 98. After that he immediately contacted his friend Franco Gambit (Ranked 96, he was tall, slim, had slicked back black hair, moustache, brown eyes, white and dressed like a card dealer with reinforced gloves) "Franco, ranked #98 has arrived"
"Ah, good, I was wondering when he would show up"
"Should I let him bring his pet wolf along?" He questioned as he was looking at the security camera pointed at the entrance
"Sure, why not, the more the merrier" After the radio was cut off, Marco connected to the radio channel to the guard at the front
"Let the wolf through" After he said that he got up from his chair and unholstered his custom .500 S&W Magnum and spun the barrel a few times before leaving the room.

-Office-

While Franco was throwing cards at a target, one of the guards came through the door,
"Sir, where should we bring our guests?"
"Bring them to the revolving game room"
"Yes sir" The guard left as Franco laughed
"So, the games have begun...Might as well enjoy it while it lasts"

-The revolving game room-

Shizu and Sora were following several guards as they went through restricted doors. When they walked in they found themselves in a dark room and that was when the door behind them was forced shut and a locking sound was heard.
"What the heck?" Shizu questioned as a trap-door sound was heard and he Sora make a yelp sound "Sora? What's happening?" That was when the sounds of various mechanisms was heard and suddenly a spotlight turned on Shizu's position.
"Shizu Irie" A deep voice said "You have entered the dragon's den, now you shall perish here in this unholy abyss"
"What is this an RPG? Turn the lights on!" Then all the lights turned on and he found himself in a giant, long corridor with Marco Sand standing at the end of the corridor, holding a microphone
"You aren't any fun aren't you? Well...We checked your abilities and records and we have designed this game room to match your abilities"
"And why not fight me directly?"
"We are just trying to spice things up because we are bored" He then stomped on the ground and both of them fell through a trap door.

-Sora-

While Shizu was about to fight Marco, he was about to fight Franco. He had ended up on some sort of platform that seemed unstable and on the other side of the platform was Franco, shuffling cards.
"Ah, yes, Shizu's wolf companion, I just have to say this, don't die to early, I want to savor this battle" He then threw several cards in the platform ground and the suddenly the entire platform had separated into many platforms of different sizes and then it had started to spin.

The game of their life had just begun.
13111111111111.title: Misunderstanding and Roulette

131111111111111.content:
In the room that Shizu had landed in, it seemed just like a very big, white empty room except that Marco was sitting in a chair at the other side of the room.
"High movement speed, reflex, and a blade that can reflect bullets and lasers alike. This is going to be quite a spectacle to watch" He then knocked on the wall behind him and then suddenly the tiles of the room started to move in a sporadic pattern and turrets came out
"Oh you have got to be kidding me"
"We kid a lot even when it is supposed to be serious, but can you blame us when there is nothing to do around here?" Then all the turrets shot at different intervals and locked on at Shizu, which he charged at Marco while reflecting and dodging bullets.

-Sora-

With his blade in his mouth he was jumping from platform to platform, not only avoiding the cards thrown by Franco (Which by the way were moving fairly quickly) but also watching the floor platforms movement so he doesn't accidentally fall off. When it seemed like he was about to get Franco with his blade he was suddenly knocked back by a giant card that had came between the gaps of the platforms,
"What the- that is not fair!" Sora yelled as Franco chuckled
"Wolf boy, come on it's a casino run by the son of an ex-mafia and a notorious gang/ bandit leader, what the hell did you expect? Also, it's justified seeing as how you got me in movement speed and agility, leg wise that is" When the card came down, Franco was suddenly gone. When he looked around he saw that he had ended up in the middle of the platform. "Time to up the ante a little bit" Then giant cards came up from between the platforms at a seemingly sporadic pattern, but really it was a complex set pattern.
"Oh now this is going to be annoying!" Sora yelled as he was attempting to go through the cards in his path, but found that he couldn't cut the cards
"Nice try, but that ain't working"

-Shizu-

When he swung his blade he discovered that Marco was protected by some sort of clear barrier. The minute he discovered this is continued to move and went to reflecting bullets back at the turrets shooting.
"Surprised? Well don't be, did you really think that I was not being protected?" After a little while deflecting bullets back the turrets, he managed to take out all them all out. "Now, time to up the ante a little bit, shall we?" He hit the wall behind him with the butt of his magnum and then mechanisms started to move again as some of the tiles that weren't destroyed had unveiled laser guns, which the lasers were continuous.
"Great..." Then the lights went out "Even more perfect!"

-Sora-

Somehow, someway, he managed to get through the card trap maze set up by Franco and both of them were in the middle.
"So, give up?" Sora questioned
"No...Not yet" Then a loud horn sound was heard "Ah, now for the main event"
"Main ev- WAH!" The platform under them collapsed as both of them fell down to the final game

-Shizu-

All of the laser guns were destroyed and the lights turned on
"So, why did you let down your barrier?"
"Because...the main event is about to start"
"Main Event?" Then a loud horn sound was heard
"Yes, now this is where the real fun starts" Then both of them had fell through trap doors.

-The main event-

It was pitch black as Sora and Shizu got up from their daze
"Ah, damn those guys" Shizu said
"Shizu, that you?" Sora questioned
"Oh hello Sora...so how was your match"
"Could've been worse"
"Mine was a bit disappointing" Then the lights had turned on and the area they were fighting in was a bit surprising as they were currently on a giant roulette wheel. "What in the-"
"Welcome and hello special guests!" Franco said as both him and Marco were sitting in the middle of the roulette wheel "This is our final event which we have been preparing to be our special arena for certain individuals and you, Shizu and...whats-your-name wolf, are our special first stunt people to test the effectiveness of this arena"
"So don't die early on, okay?" Marco had said when both of them had jumped from their high-point and Franco snapped his fingers
"Let the real games begin!" Then suddenly the roulette wheel started to spin and a giant ball came flying out of nowhere, becoming one of the many hazards of this special arena.

-River-

Remember how River was left behind to protect the RV from thieves? Well, guess how many times some people actually tried to rob the RV...I'll give you a hint. Currently she is sitting on a pile of unconscious people, whether some of them are dead or not is up to you, whistling as several guards from the casino were either staring if they had just got there or recording as they were there early on and recording the onslaught of what happened there,
"That is one scary woman" Guard 1 remarked
"What even happened here?" Guard 2 questioned
"Should we call the police or something?" Guard 3 questioned
"Nope, I'm standing here recording all the beat-downs that woman gives" Guard 1 replied.
"Yeah I'm not even going near her" Guard 2 said

-Back to the battle-

Truly, at its core, this entire arena required both skill and luck, enough skill to maintain ones balance and multitask between the opponent and arena, but also luck in which hoping your attack makes contact or hope you don't get hit by the ball. Which speaking of, while Sora was fighting Franco head on and was almost crushed by the ball and Shizu was fighting Marco. Although it seemed like the battle was going to be underwhelming, that was when Marco had retreated down the roulette board and went through one of the holes where the giant ball goes when it stops (Which normally, roulette boards don't have this, but this is only here to make the area more dangerous)
"Why the heck did that guy do that?" Shizu questioned as he looked up and saw Marco flying through the air and landing in the middle of the roulette board,
"Franco! Let's light this party up!" That was when Franco threw several cards at Marco, which those cards were of a different variations than the standard metal card he uses, and then he got taken out by Sora who had several cards sticking into him.
"Sora you okay?"
"Yeah, I am" Both of them looked up at Marco and was wondering what he was going to do. That was when he revolved his magnum barrel several times and that was when his magnum started to glow. Then he placed one of the cards in front of the magnum barrel and fired, which unleashed a barrage of lasers at the same time. Both Shizu and Sora dodged successfully as Marco had attached more cards at the front of the barrel and started shooting even more lasers. Although this was all dandy and all, unfortunately this was a case in which it would be very simple to counter him by going through the hole he went through to get up there which someone would catch his attention and block/ deflect all the lasers, which Shizu could also have aimed a laser back at Marco's legs and it would've been all over when he fell down. But that wasn't the case here as, in a struck of bad luck and bad positioning and horrible area mechanics, the ball came down and hit him right in the head and he came crashing down onto the ground below.
"Uh..." Shizu reacted to what happened
"That was anti-climactic"
"This doesn't feel like a win to me, but-"
"Winner! Shizu Irie! Congratulations, you became ranked 96!" Two people, a male and female said at the same time
"Okay..." Shizu said "Where the heck is the exit?"

-Later-

All 4 of them were in the same room, talking to each other
"That was a good show there" Franco said as he shaked hands with Shizu
"It was interesting, especially the end"
"Yeah, someone needs to fix that" Marco replied
"How did all of that work?" Sora questioned
"Money can do anything" Franco replied as he looked at Shizu, who was thinking of something "Something on your mind?"
"I'm just wondering why both of you fight..."
"To avoid any kind of headache, we'll just tell you" Marco said
"Our reason is something that is not really that significant as we only joined because we were bored" Franco said
"Considering what happened there, I thought so"
"Both of us were in a crap-hole before and we built our way up onto a pile of money, but we found life to be kind of bland" Franco continued "And so, with the skills we have trained and built up we had joined to feel the rush of fighting and you just gave us that in our games"
"For some reason the fight against both of you seemed underwhelming, when was the last time both of you fought?" Shizu questioned
"Yeah, sorry about that, both of us had gotten rusty after much time without fighting or training"
"Well, may we meet each other in better conditions" All 4 said their good-byes as Sora and Shizu went outside to see the pile of bodies that River was sitting on and the 4 guards watching it
"Uh..." Shizu said
"About time you got here" River said "The locals kept giving me a hard time, also these guys still had nothing good on them!"

Ranked #98: Marco Sand
Ranked #97: Franco Gambit
Ranked #96: Shizu Irie
Ranked #95: Markus Desola

"So, where is the next guy?" Shizu questioned
"If I recall, he should be around here somewhere"
"Really? That close?"
"Well, to be precise, in a furniture store"
"Wait, why is..."
131111111111111.title: Wolf and game

1311111111111111.content:
-To the furniture store-
River was driving while Shizu was shifting through stuff in the RV and Sora was laying down on the bed, bandaged, and sleeping.
"River, why the heck is #95 in a furniture store?"
"It's related to his weapon specialty"
"What kind of weapon specialty does that guy have that he spends his time in a furniture store?"
"You'll see"
"Hey Sora, you okay there?"
"Just let me rest Shizu, you pretty much got out of that battle unscathed while I got metal cards stuck into me"
"Hm, I think it was a good thing that those guys from before were rusty"

-At the front of the furniture store-
"Uh, River"
"Yes?"
"Why does it look like this store was ransacked, abandoned, and then attacked by graffiti artists?" Shizu refers to the abandoned, old building which for whatever reason is still standing and it looks like if somewhere were to live in there then they would be right next to about 7 gangs loitering at the same spot.
"Well, I know the drill, I stay here, kick gang members asses, loot their crappy loot while you go out and either severely injure yourself or get out unscathed"
"Well, good thing we have an understanding" Shizu went out of the RV and gone to the front of the building to see if the door was unlocked, which for some reason it was, and when he entered, not only was it dimly lit by lanterns set far and wide from each other (Which the lanterns themselves weren't that great), but for some reason there were an obscene amount of wooden chairs everywhere. And none of them were fancy, just regular generic wooden chairs and another questionable thing was that some of them were stacked in different ways for whatever reason. Of course there was also many broken chair pieces strewn all over the place.

While he was wandering around the very dim store, he heard someone whistling some sort of tune which he had no idea what it was, and when he followed he had treaded upon an area where there were multiple giant stack of chairs. Due to the fact that the whistling seemed to come from this area, he yelled,
"Hey, ranked #95, you in here?!" Then a man lazily called out
"Oh, yeah I’m here, hi there 96" Then he just stared up at the ceiling
"Um...Where the heck are you!?" Then there was the sound of a chair moving and then suddenly he seemed to have came out of nowhere as he pretty much dropped into Shizu’s point of view. Although the area was still dim he could make out that he had an average height, a slight build, black short hair, brown eyes, darkish skin and was wearing blue cargo pants, black shoes, and a blue and white shirt that looks likes he was ran over with them on. Also he had a green metal foldable chair strapped to his back "Why does it look like you got ran over?"
"Because I was" he still said lazily "let's sit down and talk" He pulled out his green chair, set it up, and then sat on it. Shizu just grabbed a random chair and also sat down "So, I can see you're a swordsman, but I bet you're wondering what I do"
"With the amount if chairs around here, I could take a guess”
"Well, that guess would be right, my weapon is chairs"
"Out of all the stuff you pick, why get chairs?"
"I don't know, maybe I wanted to be different from others, besides, that is literally the first thing I pick up during bar fights or any fight, unless the chairs are bolted down then I just go with my fists"
"Why In the world are there chairs everywhere?"
"I didn't collect them, they were already here when I made this my sanctuary, I just stacked these chairs"
"So, what is the purpose?"
"Specify”
“Why do you fight?”
“Besides being a street fighter as a profession, I am also an entertainer that specializes in balancing and I dabbled with chairs for a bit and you can figure out the rest”
“That doesn’t exactly explain your purpose”
“That would be to easy, figure it out after you see how I fight. Oh right, I forgot the formalities, my name is Markus Desola, what’s yours?”
“Shizu Irie”
“Okay Shizu” He stood up and folded his chair “I’ll show you how I’m ranked 95” He swung his chair and in response Shizu unsheathed his sword and blocked his chair "At least I know that your reflexes are top-notch" He suddenly dropped the blade-lock and ran into the darkness.
“So, I’m guessing the edge you have on me would be your ability to see in the dark?” Then the sounds of chairs breaking were heard,
“A bit of a fact, my eyes actually adjusted to the darkness for being in the dark for too long”
“Why set up the lanterns?”
“Fighting a blind person isn’t cool nor fair…Unless they are one of those people who have some super senses, 3rd eye sensory stuff” Then there was a loud creaking sound “Also…No hard feelings” When Shizu looked around him he saw one of the tower of chairs falling down in his direction. He dodged it only to narrowly dodge a piece of chair that was thrown at him.
“Well, isn’t this going to be annoying”
1311111111111111.title: Chair City

13111111111111111.content:
During the battle, the sounds of objects/breaking chairs kept echoing throughout the abandoned store which pretty much removed the option of tracking Markus' movement through sound. Overtime it was a game of avoiding the falling avalanche of chairs and blocked parts of chairs that are thrown at him which by the end of it all of the towers have fallen, leading to many chairs being on the ground, restricting his movement speed, and also a few bruises from being hit in his blind spot.
"So" Shizu thought "Not only is this man quick, but also stealthy and probably strong, from what he said his balance is high-level and coupled with that he has developed night-vision. This man could literally come out of nowhere, I can't use my sword flash and I am a sitting duck...He really thought this out" He kept turning with his sword in front trying to figure out where he is going to strike next. That was when he saw a chair coming at him and when he sliced it in half he saw that Markus used that as a cover to strike him down. When Shizu tried to counter his attack, Markus had used his chair to break his defense and he quickly unfolded his chair and rammed Shizu down onto the ground with the chair right on top of him. Before he could react, Markus had pulled out two chair legs and started to beat the living crap out of Shizu. Mid-way, Shizu had shoved the chair off of him, but that did not knock Markus off balance as he just jumped off of his chair and slammed both his feet onto Shizu's face and just retreated with his chair in hand. "Ouch..." Shizu said blankly as he quickly stood up and scanned the area for his next attack. Then he thought "I can't believe that this guy is giving me this much trouble, he is a lot better than I thought he was with being both physically able and being able to think out things out...Oh for the love of-!" While he was thinking of what to do, he just remember something in his backpack. Remember that not only does he have syringes that have different effects, but he also has things from bandages to a flare gun. He reached into his backpack and pulled out a flaregun which he put into his pocket with his hand on it at all times. Then he just waited for the right moment to use it...

-Markus-

"Okay" He thought "I used some of my tricks already and with how I see it, Shizu isn't going to fall for the same thing twice, and-" As he was watching him he saw him pull out something from his backpack "Wait, Shizu had a gun? Huh, I shouldn't be surprised, but I'm still surprised he is actually using one considering my assumption of his character...Well just as long as my chair blocks the bullets, I should be fine" He all thought while under the impression Shizu is using an actual gun.

-Shizu-

While still looking around he heard something move and saw that Markus was going for an attack from above. Although it was a sneak attack, Shizu wasn't about to slammed down again by a chair again so he dodged the strike. Immediately afterwards, Markus charged forward, using his chair similar to a shield and both of them clashed with each other.
"So, why are you being reckless now?" Shizue questioned as they were still hold each other off
"Because, I assume that sneak attacks may not work on you anymore, and so" Suddenly he moved his chair in such away that not only his only defense removed, but somehow he disarmed Shizu...Quote on quote. "Time to see how your unarmed skill is!" And then the two started to fist-fight. Also, remember, Shizu has advanced hand-eye coordination and movement speed.

As much as Markus is very good at fist-fighting with a very good balance of speed and strength, the strength part doesn't matter if it doesn't connect and his speed was not even close to Shizu's speed (But he was still fast) as the fight was pretty much Shizu dodging and blocking all of Markus' attacks and hitting where there was openings. That was when after Markus did a punch that had to much strength with it, Shizu had gone right behind him, put him into a head-lock, and pressed the flare gun right to his head.
"Surrender Markus, I do not want to fire" Shizu said blankly as Markus was shaking as, again, he thought the flare gun was an actual gun
"Ah! I surrender my rank! You win! Even though you might not fire at all, you may choke me out, which do you have any idea how many gangs are around here?!" He said quickly as Shizu made a confused face
"...Wait are you-" Markus suddenly stopped shaking
"Of course not!" He elbowed Shizu in his side and immediately got out of his hold. Soon after, before Shizu could recover Markus smashed him down with devastating blows and he seemed to have gotten faster. Shizu attempted to dodge more and counter with his own moves, it just wasn't enough as Markus was following his movements closely and was beating him up even more. That was when Markus had struck him with a particularly heavy blow as Shizu was sent flying through the darkness and into a tower of chairs.
"Ow" Shizu said as he rubbed his head as he was getting up from his position and noticed the tower of chairs falling down "Crap!" He ran as the chairs fell down violently. Covered in scratches and splinters, Shizu just looked around to see where Markus was "This guy is stronger than I thought"
"A swordsman without a sword is useless" Markus' voice echoed throughout the empty space "The same can be said about a gunslinger and an archer, they are useless without their original gear, that is why I am different, I can use anything as a weapon and I use fight without with one with ease, but in this case what's the point of fighting someone you know who is weaker?" Markus came out of the darkness holding his chair and Shizu's sword "Here" He threw and sword and Shizu caught it "Now, let's see who is stronger, the wild brawler or the disciplined swordsman" Shizu unsheathed his blade and Markus slammed his chair in front of him, which looks like he was going to charge.

Both ran at each other, as if this one move would be the deciding moment. But as they were running at each other, Shizu stopped in his tracks, pulled out his flaregun, which surprisingly wasn't knocked out of his hand when Markus was beating the living crap out of him, and fired a flare through the opening in the chair and hit Markus between the eyes, causing him to drop his chair and grab his face in pain.
"Son of a bitch this hurts!" He yelled as Shizu came up right next to him and started beating him up into a pulp with the back of his sword and bottom of his hilt. This continued until Shizu was deemed the winner, which wasn't for quite a while since Markus was apparently made out of iron with how much he was getting beaten up...

-Outside-

Outside there were bodies scattered everywhere as River was looting their bodies, Shizu was sitting at the entrance of the building with Markus whose eyes were bandaged
"Shizu" Markus said
"Yeah?"
"That wasn't necessary"
"Sorry, but that was the only way to beat you at the moment"
"You could've shot my hand or leg, but you shot me between the eyes!"
"Eh...Don't worry, what I gave you will help"
"Bah, you suck, and I hate you"
"Hm...Wait weren't you going tell me something after the fight?"
"I was?...Well, might as well, okay, although we may all be different, all the fighters are different with their own fighting styles and abilities, there is still the case that some of our weapons seem to repeat a lot which your katana is an example, too many swords, too many guns, I just want to be a lot more different from everyone and I want to be distinct and so I picked the chair, which as you can see, a weird weapon doesn't make it bad"
"Considering how much in the beginning you beat the crap out of me and how the battle played out, it was quite interesting and unique in its own way"
"Thanks for the compliment, now, I wish you luck on your journey and farewell" He said as he went through the doors and disappeared into the dark furniture store. Shizu didn't even bother talking to River as he went inside and greeted Sora which didn't even reach his ears as he was fully asleep. He sat down at the table and just contemplated on something,
"I'm getting close to the original ranked #9...I wonder how that battle is going to play out..."

Ranked #96: Markus Desola
Ranked #95: Shizu Irie
Ranked #94. Ryan Bell
Ranked #93. Darwin Merce
Ranked #92. Anna Range
Ranked #91. Katana Shimanouchi
13111111111111111.title: Wolf and chairs

131111111111111111.content:
-While in the RV, still in Las Vegas-
Shizu and River were sitting at the table while Sora was sleeping.
"We're going to Japan?" Shizu questioned, repeating the location River mentioned
"That is where the next 4 ranked individuals are at, so it's not going to be a problem"
"With all this moving around, why the heck can't I fight and defeat ranked guys in my immediate vicinity and just skip ahead of everyone?"
"Actually you can, but a defeat to a member that is ahead of you by a boundary means you have to beat the boundary ranked member in order to continue and it is recommended to fight in order as you may die early by skipping and you get more experience and money in tow. But it is possible to skip ahead within the rankings if the person is within your numbering"
"Okay then, with that clear, let's get a plane ticket-"
"Let's not take a plane, I think it would be better if we should go on a cruise ship"
"Does it look like we're going on a vacation somewhere?" Shizu questioned with a blank face
"No, but you have basically been fighting non-stop for about a month, maybe more, so you might as well relax, besides, we are not in any hurry, those guys aren't going anywhere, we can definitely afford it (If anything we might as well buy a cruise ship with how we spend the overall funds on supplies and nothing more) and you need to put a damper on your fighting spree because you keep getting more injuries than you can heal!"
"My fighting spree? In terms of quantity, you beat me in the leagues" Then River just death stared him
"All of those were either nuisances or self-defense, you're the one that keeps hunting down the strongest fighters in the world!" Then there was a long silence after that and River is still death staring him.
"You know, I heard somewhere that there's at least a 0.00000000000000000000675% chance that a stare can kill someone and maybe a curse...You just increased that by like 40%, maybe even more if you started cursing" And then from that comment both of them went into an argument which most of it was irrelevant random stuff and was hilarious.
While they were arguing, Sora was thinking of this,
"Both of them would make one heck of a couple...Just go on the cruise ship ride, make-up, do some romantic plot-line/sub-story, and then drop it like nothing happens in the end...Or do some titanic crap while I'm floating away on an iceberg with penguins and polar bears...Of course this isn't...Wait what do those guys call it...A shonen or something? Well whatever it is, we aren't in one"

-Harbor in California-

Shizu was carrying both his and Rivers luggage as Sora was wearing some canine-sized luggage-thing on him. The RV that they rode in was driving off in good hands of the courier transport team.
"I shouldn't be surprised that I lost that argument" Shizu said as he was boarding the ship
"You know it was common sense to take the ship ride over the plane ride for luxury reasons" River responded
"Still, beating me half to death wasn't necessary"
"You took on an electrical powerhouse, lasers, multiple slashes and bruises. You were just going to be fine"

-A little while later-

All 3 were in their designated room which was designed for 2 people and Sora immediately went on top of one of them and laid down.
"Jeez" Shizu said "Why do people think we're a couple?"
"Probably because of me being female, you being male, and the fact we have a 'pet' with us, no offense" River said as Shizu put down the luggage
"None taken" Sora responded
"So what on earth do you do on a cruise ship exactly?" Shizu questioned
"You really haven't been on one before?"
"I've been on ships before, just not on a luxury cruise liner"
“Well then, let me show you how to relax for once!” River grabbed Shizu by the arm and they went out of the room quickly as Sora was left to sleep on the bed.

While the cruise was just beginning, there was a familiar face with his courier and a new face that were on board the ship and were leaning on the guard rails.
"Was it really necessary to get on the ship?" His courier questioned, which both of them are wearing the same thing.
"Well, since he came back from Las Vegas and is about the fight the 4, might as well give him good luck"
"You know that these people are going to figure out we're stowaways soon, right?"
"Probably, then we just abandon ship and swim as fast as possible"
"So, what makes you think that this man is really going to make it very far?"
"Just a soldiers intuition...An intuition that has made it through Pandora's box"
"So, why didn't you just talk to him before we set off to sea?"
"I just wanted to check out Japan and then come right back, shouldn't be a problem...By the way, how many couriers and rankers are on this ship right now?" His courier pulled out his cellphone and checked the radar
"Including me and you, there are 6 onboard, along with 3 ranked people also"
"Who the heck's the 3rd one?"
"Not sure"
"Wait, they don't track information like that?"
"Nope"

-The 3rd ranked person onboard-

The 3rd ranked person on board (Description: Short, skinny, long black hair, hazel and blue eye, pale. Wearing multi-colored long-sleeve shirt, orange pants and black shoes) had just entered his room and set up shop to continue working on his manga, but only after he talked with a certain friend of his, when he went onto video chat a visual of a young-girl wearing a gothic loli dress came on
"Konichiwa Johnny-san!"
"Konichiwa Katana-chan"

Interesting how 3 ranked people are on the same ship together, eh?
131111111111111111.title: Prelude to ship-ride

1311111111111111111.content:
Of course all of you guys know that this ride isn't going to be all relaxing as something will happen...

-Shizu and River-
While at the very end of the ship, Shizu and River were looking out at the ocean look at the sun reflecting off the water which it looked beautifully and had a calming effect.
"Are you feeling stressed at all Shizu?"
"Not really, my mind is clear and my soul is feeling at peace"
"Good, now let's keep this up until-" Before she could even finish, Joseph just came out of nowhere from over the railing and, although he was calm, that didn't mean he was on guard, he kicked Joseph off the railing and down to the sea. "What was that?!"
"Wait...That guy looked familiar" Shizu looked over the railing and recognized the man's outfit "Whoops, that was Joseph...Sorry Joseph!"
"Hey you remember my name!" He yelled as he went under, by his own will of course.
"...Wait why the heck is he on this ship" he questioned as Joseph's courier suddenly came up behind him
"Because you were in the vicinity" His sudden appearance made Shizu tensed up as he didn't notice him coming and River had the, where the heck did you come from, face.
"What does that mean?"
"It mean's that he came personally to give you good luck for fighting the 9th boundary and her 3 guards"
"That guy really didn't need to do that"
"Oh he did, you know that dog tag he gave you?" Shizu pulled it out to show it clearly
"Considering its condition and that the dog tag isn't even his, I think I got the message"
"Good, now if you'll excuse me" He jumped onto the railing "I have to make sure Joseph didn't die" He jumped off
"Well" Shizu stated "This is going off quite nicely.

And here is the cruise in a nutshell (Till midway). River is attempting to make Shizu relaxed, which is going poorly as it's not Shizu's fault that he is not relaxing, its the stuff that goes around him from children pestering him, people making remarks and assumptions of River and Shizu being a couple which peeves him off quite a bit, he got into quite a few accidents from when he let his guard down and he ended up going overboard (Which Joseph was still around and he saved him several times) he got into several fights when people actually tried to steal his sword (Broken spirits and bones ahoy) and to top it all off, Sora was a giant sarcastic troll that actually attempted several times to ship both of them together just for the sake of entertainment...which Shizu is an impenetrable wall with a strong bastion couple along with that.

Despite all of this, he still managed to remain calm overall and the best moments were of peace and the moments he spent with River, which they got to know each other a bit more from River's backstory to Shizu's insane adventures while hilarity ensues. A few days from this and currently it is nighttime with Shizu being out and River sleeping with Sora on the bed.

"I wonder what the sea looks at night, from your own eyes" Went he went to the front of the ship he spotted someone right at the edge of it holding a sketchbook and just drawing. (To remind everyone: Description: Short, skinny, long black hair, hazel and blue eye, pale. Wearing multi-colored long-sleeve shirt, orange pants and black shoes) When he came up behind him, he just said a simple greeting "Hi there"
"Yo" The drawer said, who had a young-sounding voice, and his concentration not broken
"So, what are you doing up so late at night?"
"One of my personalities thought it would be beneficial for me to go outside for once, well might as well draw something while I do that"
"Your personalities?"
"Multiple-personality syndrome"
"Another interesting character I seemed to have met" Shizu thought "Well, see you" When he turned around, the guy grabbed him by the shoulder
"By the way, you're Shizu Irie, are you not?"
"Yes I am, who's asking?" He looked over his shoulder and saw the deep stare of both his eyes shining in the moonlight "This doesn't look good" He thought
"I am also a ranked member, Johnny Rivas, you don't know me, but I know you from the couriers on this ship talking, now, let's fight here on the deck, right here, right now"
"Well this is sudden, give a reason why I should"
"Just think of it as a bead on a ranked member who is higher up than you, a practice battle if you will"
"You know, not to be arrogant, cocky, or overconfident, but are you sure?"
"Yes I am sure"
"Okay then" Both of them walked away from each other and put a fair distance between them. "Ready?" Then Johnny pulled out a metal pole with a scalpel at the end of it, which he pulled that seemingly out of nowhere. He spun it several times around him skillfully as he ended it with holding his weapon like a regular sword
"While you fight, I will see your true emotion through your actions, with how you see and know the environment around you while I get inspiration to see the art of battling of another beside my own" When he said that, Shizu remember the words said by Jenkins and his own goals...strange how they seem to match in a way. Both of them charged at each other and clashed blades...

While that fight was going on, Joseph and his courier were watching far away while sitting on the railing,
"Wow" Joseph reacted "That guy has one weird fighting style"
"Well, he is particularly known for being unique in his own fashion"
"Shizu may be fast at his movement and swordsmanship skills, but that guy is reading him like a book and blocking all of his attacks, not only that, but his fighting style seems to be quite debilitating"
"Agreed, so, how confident are you in that man, really?"
"Well, in this battle, he seems to have lost, but that means he can learn more from people who can outclass them in their own way"

After the fight ended, Shizu hit the ground completely as he couldn't feel his arms, legs, and just felt pain internally. That was when Johnny was over him, "Thanks for the fight, sorry if I was a bit to rough, this was really beneficial for inspiration for my art and manga" Then he tried to lift Shizu up, which he was having some difficulties trying before Joseph and his courier came along to assist. "Oh, hello there"
"We know where his room is, we can take him" The courier said as they carried him off to his room while Johnny was standing there looking.
"Without any words, I can tell that person is nice and he is going to be fun" On the way over to his room, Shizu said,
"Wow, that guy was good"
"Yeah, we saw" The courier responded
"That was interesting to see" Joseph said
"That person I just fought...for some reason I can connect to him"
"Pretty much how you connected with me" Joseph said as they got to Shizu's room "So, is it unlocked or-"
"I got the key" When they unlocked the door, it just so happens that River was up and when she saw Shizu she was not amused...

-Johnny-

He started a video chat with Katana again, which this time she was wearing cat-ears
"Konichiwa!" She said loudly
"Konichiwa, I just met that guy that is going through the rankings and fought him"
"How was Shizu-san?"
"Judging from our fight, he is going to give you a good time"
"Yay! Bye-bye, I am going to sleep now" Then the video chat shut off as he hit head on the desk
"Dang, I really should watch my sleeping pattern, I feel like death now"
1311111111111111111.title: Screwball ship ride

13111111111111111111.content:
Though mid-way the screwballing has reduced significantly, it still happened.

-Morning-

Shizu was lying in bed with bandages at his joints and his head and Sora was lying at the foot at the bed still sleeping despite what had happened. River was out doing something by herself and Shizu was essentially bored and thinking deeply about many things which I am not even going to describe one of them. That was when Johnny entered the room, carrying a laptop and an umbrella, and he grabbed a chair and just sat beside Shizu.
"So...sorry about that" Johnny said as he opened his laptop and started working on his project
"Well, I think I should have fought harder than what I did there"
"Yeah, I noticed how that fight was a bit...underwhelming, but it gave me some ideas so it wasn't all bad"
"Well, you did say practice match, and how you fought surprised me so much, also what are you working on?”
"I’m working on a project, which I'm almost done with it"
"By the way, why are you on this ship?"
"I won a free ship ride from a contest I entered and our meeting is coincidental"
"Okay" After a little while of silence, Johnny took a look at Shizu's head injury
"Wait, I don't remember giving you that how did that happen?" Then Sora suddenly woke up from his slumber and said
"River was mad that Shizu had another fight on a ride that is supposed to alleviate fighting stress...As you can see she is a hypocrite" Then Johnny just stared at Sora "What?"
"A talking white wolf...and Shizu, either you have a tsundere companion or your companion is incredibly violent"
"What the heck is a tsundere?" Johnny closed his laptop and stood up
"You can figure it out" Johnny just left the room without another word.

When he went out and closed the door, Joseph and his courier were standing outside listening to the conversation. They said nothing to each other as both Joseph and his courier went the opposite direction of Johnny,
"Oh" Johnny said "If you're going to do what I think you're going to do, I am against it fully" Joseph turned around
"Don't worry, we're just going to talk to her" Joseph continued walking as Johnny opened his umbrella as he was about to step into the sunlight "I wonder where those guys have been hiding on the ship"

-Later in Shizu's room-

Pretty much all the significant characters are in his room with Johnny sitting in the corner with his laptop, Joseph and his courier bandaged up and slightly wet, with River behind them making a peeved face and Sora is lying on top of the bed, who is wide awake
"Why is everyone in my room?" Shizu questioned as he sat up
"These two had a chat with me” River responded
“Translation” Sora said after “I wrecked them and threw them overboard” Then River came up and bonked Sora on the head with the blunt side of her blade.
“A lot of things are happening on this ship” Shizu said as he face palmed “But at least it’s interesting”

-Entirety of the ship ride in the nutshell-

While most of them were screwing around the entire time, Johnny spent most of his time inside doing something and chatting away with his little buddy with sleeping on occasion/ falling asleep while doing something and those screwball moments on the ship between the others were incredibly…well they were entertaining to say the least.

-Outside the ship-

It was daytime when the ship had arrived at Japan. Which again, all of the significant characters are gathered there with the only thing off is Joseph slinging his courier over his shoulder. The reason for that is because he got ‘mysteriously knocked unconscious.’
“Well, see you guys later” Joseph said as he put on his rebreather and jumped into the harbor water. Everyone else turned to each other and talked,
“So, where are we going?” Shizu questioned and before River could answer Johnny said,
“I could lead you to your destination; after all, we’re going to the same place”
“Okay then, lead the way” When they started walking Johnny stopped, “Hey, aren’t you Japanese?”
“Yes, why?”
“Your English seems pretty good”
“Considering how much I’ve been around the world, my accent kind-of…evens out”
“So, how’s your Japanese?” <(If dialogue is like this, it is basically a translation)
“Bet I know it better than you”
“Is that a challenge?” When they started walking off toward whatever public transportation was available while still talking in Japanese, Sora and River just looked at each other, with River saying,
“We’re going to have a bad time, aren’t we?”
“Most likely”
“You wouldn’t happen to know-“
“Not at all, where are we going?”
“The home of original ranked 9th, which also houses the other 3 below her and is the pure definition of ‘don’t just a book by its cover’…Seriously”
“And why is that?”
“You’ll see soon”

And then they took a bus ride to the home of the next ranked 4
13111111111111111111.title: Good morning sunshine, screw you

131111111111111111111.content:
After taking a bus-ride to their destination they had all got off near a very large and a rather good-quality looking apartment building. After going to the front door, Johnny went to some intercom-number pad thing on the right side of the door and pressed several numbers. The doors opened afterwards after he finished putting in the password.

The interior of the apartment building was actually quite normal-looking, nothing too fancy aesthetically, with a reception desk off to the side, the elevator on another side and a staircase in the back. At the reception desk was a man wearing some sort of guard uniform with the only noticeable detail being the head-gear which seems to be some sort of security device. He turned at the entering group direction and said, in Japanese,
“Oh, Johnny-kun, I forgot you were coming. Katana’s up in her room doing the same old”
“Okay” Johnny replied “What about the others?”
“All of them are out doing their own thing as always” The group just went into the elevator, which to clarify the building has 10 floors, Johnny pressed the button for the top floor and they all just idly talked away.
“So” Shizu said “Just out of curiosity, who owns this building?”
“Technically speaking, that would be the person you are about to meet, but overall it belongs to all 4 of the next ranked people”
“Another question, who are the people that live in this building?”
“None of them are ‘normal’ people if that's what you’re asking, they are either ranked, couriers, assassins, or other things.”
“Okay then, good to know” The elevator doors opened and they followed Johnny straight toward a certain door, which the number was 91.

When he was about to open the doorknob he signaled the others to stand back. The minute he opened the door he said,
“Hey Katana, I’m here!” Then suddenly a squeal was heard and Johnny was tackled down and embraced by a young little-girl wearing a black Lolita dress with cat ears and a tail. While he was petting her head everyone just stared “Guys, I would like to introduce Katana Shimanouichi” Katana lets go of Johnny, stands back up, and just flashes the cutest smile
“Hi!” Everyone was still staring “Why is everyone staring at me like that?”
“Just for clarification” Shizu said “Is this #91?”
“Unbelievably, yes” River replied “Honestly I’m surprised as you are as all I knew was that she looked very young despite her age, but this is pushing it”
“How old is she?” River shrugged as sounds of grunting was hear and ignored
“I don’t know, definitely more than 18” That was when Sora interrupted their conversation
“Guys…little help here” Both of them turned their attention to Sora, which Katana was on top of him and hugging his neck “Don’t ask how this happened”
"Sora" Shizu stated "Why do you keep attracting females and Katana why are you doing that?"
"Sora-kun reminds me of someone"
"How in the world-"

-Later-

Everyone was in Katana’s room, which was quite large with shelves of manga and anime with a messy bed and the TV being left on an incredibly awkward scene which if I were to explain what was happening I would have to change the story age rating. For more details, Katana was sitting on the bed reading a manga as everyone else was sitting at the table
“So…” Shizu started “What the heck are we doing?”
“Well” Katana said as she was still reading “You are going to choose how the fight is going to play out”
“How?”
“Maybe individually, maybe multiple, or facing all of u as once”
“Why the heck would I fight all of you at once?”
“The money gained increases, you gain more experience, and other things”
“Anything specific?”
“Nope, only that it gets better depending on how you play this out” Shizu looked back to his little group.
“I’m not an idiot and facing 4 at the same time is just a wish to die”
“Shizu” Sora said “Aren’t you curious about the item she is going to give?”
“No”
“Experience and/or money?”
“I’m not greedy and what experience? How many times am I going to fight multiple rankers at the same time?”
“You never know”
“I guess it wouldn’t hurt that much, that is if I can get certain people in…Hey Katana, can I bring in extra rankers and couriers for this?”
"I don't see a reason not to"
“Okay” Then Shizu thought “Wait why is something like this even allowed?” Then he said “Okay, I know what I’m doing”
“And that would be?” Katana questioned
131111111111111111111.title: Chat and Discussion

1311111111111111111112.content:
“Multiple ranked fighting”
“Fine with me” Katana said as she pulled out a cell phone from seemingly out of nowhere
“Shizu” River said “Why did you pick the multiple option?”
“Don’t worry, I didn’t pick that just to die, I have something planned…Hey Katana, where are we fighting at?” When he asked the question she just put her cell phone back…somewhere
“The place is already set, it’s under this building” She turned off he television and went toward the doorway “Come, I’ll show” Everyone got up and followed Katana toward the destination. Which they entered the elevator and Katana pressed the elevator buttons in a certain pattern and it went down.
“Hey River, mind if I borrow your cellphone?” River reached into her bag, got her cellphone, and then handed it to him “Thanks”
“Why do you need it?” She asked as Shizu had texted something on it and sent it to someone.
“Preparations…For the mean time, I might keep this” When he said that the elevator had made it to its destination.

When the doors opened, what was seen is some sort of underground parking lot which not only did it have dim lighting, but also a lack of people and quite a few vehicles.
“This is where we are fighting” Katana said as all of them exited which Johnny had a particular expression
“Oh, it’s the parking lot…Well excuse me while I find a safe place to observe this fight!” He went back into the elevator and immediately went up.
“I don’t like the feel of this” Shizu said as Katana giggled and then disappeared into thin air “What the-“
“All 4 of us are in this parking lot” She said with a slight echo going through the parking lot and then all the lights suddenly turned off. Then the sounds of several motorcycles were heard as the lights of headlights were seen coming toward their direction with several green circles barely visible as the group of 3 were blinded by the headlights. When the motorcycles passed by them, River and Sora were grabbed leaving Shizu alone as the motorcycles just disappeared into the darkness. Then the parking lot lights turned back on with Shizu looking around his immediate area. A giggling sound was heard then a rising laughter came out “Are you strong Shizu-san?” Katana questioned with a serious tone “You know this world of ours isn’t just fun and games, it’s an abyss with people who have been destroyed and degenerated from within from the past of this world of ours. If you are truly strong…face the people who have become strong from their strive and dark past…Face people who will give it their all to prove that they aren’t weak! Not like the so-called deadliest person…But I guess I should look at myself first…Never the less, prepare yourself for hell!” Those last words echoed for quite a bit before silence had set in.
“Interesting” Shizu commented as he pulled out a green vial from his bag and unsheathed his blade “Hope your poison is potent Jenkins” He spread the poison carefully on his blade. After he was done he begun wandering around the parking lot carefully and on full alert “Every ranker in this rankings is either broken to some degree or have a personal agenda they must accomplish…I wonder if he got my message”

-Later from when Shizu started-

In the same parking lot there was another elevator going down to its level. When it opened, 2 men in green and brown military-like uniforms walked out with the one behind the other holding a cellphone in his hand,
“You sure this is the place Pistolet?” Joseph questioned in a hushed voiced (Pistolet is the actual name of his courier)
“Yes sir this is the place” His courier replied as he put his cellphone in his bag
“Good” He pulled out his flechette gun while his courier pulled out a silenced pistol “Stay to the shadows or wartime?” Then the sounds of a battle was echoed throughtout the parking lot
“Recommendation, guns blazing” Pistolet said as he took off the silencer of his pistol while Joseph transformed his flechette gun into a 3-barreled mini-gun
“Alright…Today may a good day to die, but we aren’t going down yet”
“Why the heck are you saying that for?”
“Words of encouragement” When they were walking in the direction of the fight the sounds of chains were heard “Did you hear-“ Then a swarm of chains came out of nowhere as both of them fired.

-Back to Shizu from the beginning-

After avoiding an arrow shot at him, Shizu went into cover behind a van as he continuously looked around his surroundings,
"I see" A female voice said "So his reflexes really are that good"
"But how good?" A rough male voiced questioned "I would love to see how he does against me"
"Guys" Another male said "Before you do, let me see if this man is the real deal. He may have bypassed the others, but how will he do against real skill?"
"Ryan" The other male said "Go ahead"
"Understood" When Shizu peeked around the corner he saw a male coming of the darkness spinning around a chain with a chakram (Bladed Frisbee...Basically) at the end of it. (Rank 94: Ryan Bell, average height, average build, short black hair, brown eyes, light-brown skin. Light brown leather armor, pants, and brown boots.) "Come on Shizu, show me what you got!" Shizu came out of hiding with his blade out in front. Ryan stopped spinning his chained chakram and caught it in his hand as he pulled out 4 more chakrams and threw them all at Shizu. Standing his ground, Shizu was going to block/ dodge all of them...That was until all of them had split up into two disks mid-way.
1311111111111111111112.title: Parking Lot rumble

13111111111111111111121.content:
Seeing as how the chakrams suddenly split up which all of them arching different in different directions, Shizu just ran back to cover resulting in all the chakrams completely missing their mark and a couple hitting the van itself,
“Oh for the love of-“ He then threw a chakram toward the bottom opening of the van, but Shizu anticipated that and just jumped to avoid it “Quit hanging on to that van like it was your mother and father!” Shizu poked his head over the van’s corner and replied,
“My (Dead) father was a massive douchebag and my mother died when I was young, so shut it because this is a tactic” Ryan just facepalmed for a bit,
“You know what this is going to get us nowhere (Also you made me feel bad now)” He whistled “Guys, lets just end this quickly!” Then on cue several explosive bolts were shot at the van, sticking near the engine and the place where you insert gas.

Shizu just ran as when something is beeping at you when it strikes near your position just spells out ‘boom’. Well thankfully he managed to run quick enough before the van exploded.
“Jeez” Shizu thought as he was now facing Ryan face to face which running to cover would help, but also may kill him at the same time so he’s not risking it until he knows where the heck the others are. Both of them were staring each other down, looking to see who would make the first move with Shizu just holding his sword preparing to defend with Ryan swinging 2 chained chakrams. Then he stopped swinging them and caught them in his hands,
“You know before this fight began I gathered some information of your combat abilities and you know what?”
“What?”
“I had half a mind to forfeit right on the spot out of pure info alone, but based on how you are here says differently…oh and by the way check your 6”
“Eh?” Shizu turned around and saw big, bad, and…big about to grab him (Rank 93: Darwin Merce: tall, medium build, black medium length hair, brown eyes eyes, tan skin. Thick, grey armor with a helmet with a visor) Before he could grab him, Shizu just rolled away, but then stopped as a thermal bolt grazed his face. He looked in the direction of where it came from and barely saw someone in the dark area of the parking lot (Rank 92: Anna Range: Average height, slight build, brown hair in ponytail, hazel eyes, white. Wearing black and grey long-sleeve shirt, pants, and shoes)
“Damn it I missed” Anna commented as she loaded in several bolts into her vertical crossbow
“Ryan, why the hell did you give away my position!?” Darwin yelled
