“It wouldn’t be that fair to take ambush someone from the dark like that (And considering the last time you did that the person had all their bones shattered like glass) Anyhow” Ryan turned around and ran toward an entrance “Good look with Shizu!”
“Get back here you!” Ryan was long gone by then and Darwin just facepalmed “Right after he said ‘real skill’ he leaves the area” Then Shizu said while he was a fair distance, using a pillar as cover.
“For a group of people who are supposed to be fighting together, you sure are lacking a certain something” Then Darwin pulled out his Nock Gun (An actual gun which is custom made to be usable and not absolute crap in todays standards. Translaton of a Nock gun: 7 barrels of death of devastating recoil) And in reaction to seeing the big gun, Shizu thought “That doesn’t look good”
“You know that there are more things that meet the eye right?” Darwin instantly fired his shotgun afterwards and there were devastating results as part of the pillar was blown away to rubble and several parts of the ground and probably some cars in the back suffered quite some damage.

After recovering quickly from the shock and awe of the power of his shotgun he focused on Anna, who fired several bolts in quick succession, but Shizu ended up catching all of them which he made few observations and planning “That crossbow of hers fires bolts faster than usual and it is apparent that she has more than poison bolts on hand, not only that but that big guy and his gun is a bigger issue thus far…Well time to aim for weakspots” He reached into his backpack and pulled out a flare gun. While he was thinking and doing that action, Anna was reloading with explosive bolts and thinking,
“Damn showoff, let’s see you catch this” While Darwin was reloading and thinking
“God damn range” Both of them took aim with Darwin focusing on destroying his cover and Anna shooting at a right moment. Then the first shot was fired and all kinds of crap broke loose...

-Where we left off with the other group-
Joseph and Pistolet were both bleeding as the chains that attacked them literally came out of nowhere with parts of them scattered across the floor with assorted blades attached to them as well,
“Jeez” Pistolet commented “That was close”
“I think we nearly got decapitated” Joseph said as he took a step forward and something had caught onto his right leg and lifted him off of the ground “Ah, what the heck!?” He looked at his leg and saw nothing grabbing onto his leg, but there definitely was something there “What kind of black-magic voodoo is this? This is a damn reminder of that swamp!” Then he gave himself goosebumps of him remembering that place. Then a man came out of the darkness (Ryan) and both of the men aimed their guns at him,
“Hello there-“ Before he even finished both men opened fired only to see that some sort of ‘invisible wall’ was protecting him. When they stopped firing the ‘invisible wall’ turned into a visible wall of chains that fell apart with damage “How rude” Both men were in disbelief as a girls laughter was heard,
“You know…little fish like you should stick to the pond” Then a little girl (Katana) came out of the darkness wearing a cloak “The ocean is filled with things like sharks and other predators not meant for people of your caliber” Both men were in even more disbelief when Katana came out
“Sorry” Joseph said “But I cannot take you seriously” It looked like Katana held something in her right hand, as when she seemingly pulled something in the air, the force on his right leg increased drastically and the sound of one’s bone being crushed was heard…and so is the agonizing scream of it “Pistolet!” With 1 word, Pistolet just threw down an extremely potent smoke bomb as it filled the surrounding area up very quickly.

When the smoke cleared, he was long gone (Which the smoke lasted for quite a while)
“Just what are you doing?” Katana questioned as she released some pressure on Joseph’s leg
“Assisting a friend in need” He replied as he had a cellphone in his hand, which had gone unnoticed.
“Why even? He is just going to leave you, it’s not like you have been with him for that long”
“Judgement of character, respect, present, future, the list goes on, even if we haven’t been with each other that long I can see things that you probably can’t see due to your limited view on things”
“What are you? The author of this plotline?”
“Nope, I’m just a side-character for the plot to continue onto the epilogue and hope for a happy ending”
“Can you really hope for one? Not everything is happily ever after”
“That depends on 2 things, the higher beings of this world and how the character see’s and interact with one’s environment…which from you, little girl, you are a sheep in wolfs clothing"
“Jeez” Katana said “From what I read about Shizu, you are sounding just like him now”
“I may think similarly to him, but in terms of action” He aimed his gun at Katana “I know when to hold back and strike with all my might!” He fired as Katana immediately let go of the chain as she pulled a katana out of nowhere and Ryan got out his chakrams and they spun on their own like chainsaws. “I did my part, now you do yours” He hit the ground on his straight on his feet and pressed a button on the cellphone he was holding. Before he could be hit by either ranker there was a large explosion and the floor below them had collapsed…
13111111111111111111121.title: Wolf and Gank

131111111111111111111211.content:
Darwin was sprawled on the ground twitching with his gun leaning down on his head with cut marks on his joints and his helmet visor (And eyes) burned as Anna was sitting against a car with a cut on her arm and a stab wound on her shoulder, whom of which is also paralyzed. Shizu didn’t come out all that well as he was covered in enough gunpowder that a single spark would turn him into the human torch, he had several bolts in him as there was also a gunshot wound on his left shoulder. He pulled out several syringes out of his bag for removing the poison, alleviating the pain, and something to increase the healing process as he is pulling out the bolts.
“Damn” He laid down onto the ground “That could’ve been a lot better, but also a lot worse” He looked at the 2 rankers he fought “Wow, Jenkins’ poison really is potent, it looks like they’re dead”
“Hey” Anna said weakly “Are you going to do something to Katana?”
“The worst injuries would be a cut or stab wound, nothing more” While Shizu was still laying down Pistolet had appeared onto the scene
“Shizu! Jo- Holy crap are you okay?!” He said after examining him
“I’ve been cut by storms of blades, struck by powerhouses, and cooked by lasers, this is nothing, now what were you saying?”
“Joseph is-“ Then there was a large explosion sound forcing Shizu to immediately get up “Just followed me! He’s fighting rankers 91 and 94!” Both of them ran to his position as Shizu said
“What the heck did he do?!”
“He assisted his friend!”

-Explosion site-

There was dust everywhere as both Ryan and Joseph were laying down onto rubble on the next floor below as Katana was hanging onto a chain blade that she threw into the ceiling before she landed. She let go of the chain and walked toward Joseph who was still conscious, unlike Ryan who was bleeding from his head. Katana pulled a sword that went slightly between his eyes, causing a trinkle of blood to come out,
“Do you have a deathwish?” She questioned with anger in her tone
“It’s what I signed up for” Joseph quipped as Katana was reeling up her swing to slash Joseph as a gunshot was heard and the sword was shot out of her hand with her holding her hand as it was slightly bleeding. She looked up to see Shizu with his sword slung over his shoulder and Pistolet aiming his pistol,
“Don’t go off killing my friend” Shizu said as both of them jumped down from their position, with Pistolet immediately tending to Joseph “I didn’t kill yours, so where do get off by killing mine?” Katana had a pissed off face and pulled a katana out of nowhere and pointed a finger at Shizu
“You may have taken the others out, but I’m not going to go down easily!” She yelled as she grabbed something in the air and pulled which the sounds of chains and metal clanging were heard and she charged at him. Then all around both of them were a massive amount of chains and blades that were gunning for both of them with absolutely no visible room to defend against all of them, which it appears that this was a type of last resort kind of thing, so as a response, he sheathed his blade and ran at Katana…

Several chains were left hung and drawn with some scattered across the floor along with several assorted blades. As light from above and around hardly illuminated the area as the dust didn’t exactly help, it was clear what had happened and for most people it would be a shocker. Shizu’s blade was laying near Joseph and pistolet while he was on the ground holding Katana as her blade was plunged right through him and with the surplus amount of blades going into him. Katana had a shocked face at what just happened and just cried a little as she just remembered something from this action,
“Why?” She whispered before she screamed “Why would this idiot do something like this? What kind of person does this to their opponent?! Especially one that almost killed your friend, what kind of cliché main hero protagonist is this guy supposed to be?!” Joseph just stood up to answer that question
“As you can see, Shizu is different from most rankers. His ideals and thoughts are contrast to most people and although both he and I think alike, our actions defined us and that is what sets him apart” He picked up his blade which had some blood on it “You know Shizu doesn’t die easily right?” He swung the blade and the blood came off easily, leaving a trail of its quick movement “Like his sword, he is just going to brush this all off quickly…Shizu let go of the loli assassin like a lolicon already” On cue Shizu just got up despite having about 17 assorted blades jammed into his body and an extra one going through his abdomen, he staggered a little once he fully got up.
“How are you still alive?!” Katana questioned as she tried to move “Wait, why can’t I move?!”
“Paralysis” Shizu said which he coughed up some blood and he began pulling out syringes and injecting himself. There was a distinct cut mark on Katana’s abdomen, which although it wasn’t bleeding that much, it still went deep enough that the poison on his blade had entered her system. “Will you yield? Please do, I already responded to one of your friends that at the worst I would give you a cut or stab wound” Then he coughed up more blood “Also I’m almost dead” he said with such calmness it was like he wasn’t going to die in about a minute. Katana just sighed and said in a disappointing tone, which took a lot away from her recent dark-peeved tone,
“I can’t believe I lost like this!” Then suddenly her voice changed to a lighter tone “Oh well things like this happen, it’s not the end of the world and at least it was fun and killed my boredom”
“Great, sweet innocence is back” Shizu responded as he fell to the ground on his hands and knees “Can someone call 911 or a black market doctor?” Then Pistolet raised his cellphone
“Already did it ahead of time”
“That’s good…Now wake me up when I’m not dead” Then Shizu just hit the ground and blacked out.

95: Ryan Bell
94: Darwin Merce
93: Anna Range
92: Katana Shimanouchi
91: Shizu Irie

"You know that there are some things that you can't change in a person, right? Depending on the person themselves, they would either hold something to their grave or from certain events they can change drastically. That one thing they hold close is something that defines them" -Jerry Jenkins
131111111111111111111211.title: What defines us

1311111111111111111112111.content:
-In a hospital room somewhere-

Nothing significant to say about the room itself beside the fact that everyone was separated by white curtains and the injured are half naked and were covered in bandages like they were mummies and that goes especially for Shizu considering he was the most damaged during the fight, also River and Sora are back in his possession…Though they could’ve waited to release River until after he recovered because she was tearing him a new one with words like he was his mother…Well at least she cares. Anyhow, after River and Sora went out to do their own thing, Katana went into Shizus’ section and then sat on his abdomen, causing a bit of pain to him.
“So” She said in a curious tone “What was with that main protagonist stunt you pulled?”
“Because when one of your friends asked what I was going to do to you I answered ‘at the worst a cut or stab wound, nothing more’ Or something like that, so that's what I did, only left you with a cut” She had an annoyed face
“So you took all of those hits…because of that?”
“Yep” She shook her head after hearing that and then went close to his face
“You really are an idiot”
“Since we’re insulting each other, the fact that you and your friend’s purposes relate to bonds of friendship and proof that you are strong, not weak is generic, cliché, and repetitive with the amount of times I saw that” Katana made a cute pissed off face and then pressed her forehead against his
“It happened like that, shut it!” She said with a bit of temper
“Get your head off my head before-“ Then Joseph opened the curtain to their section
“Hey Shizu” Then he looked at the scene as both Shizu and Katana looked at him “I think they have a term for this…Lolicon was it? If not, then what in the world are you doing?”
“3 things, I am not a lolicon, second, where the heck did you get that term, third, I’m incapacitated!”
“When you are walking the streets of Japan you hear things and see things, also, I know I’m just screwing with you”
“So” Shizu said “What do you want?” Joseph went to Shizu’s backpack and placed a pistol and a spare rebreather in it,
“How good are you at using guns?”
“I’m good at using the flaregun so I’m not quite sure” Joseph sighed and rubbed his neck,
“Look, I know that you are good at what you do, but you have to branch-out at some point, besides if you kept this up the people who use explosives are going to give you hell"
"I'll take you up on that offer, also aren't I walking into hell already?" Joseph was silent for a moment


-Later on the apartment rooftop at night-

After mostly recovering, Shizu was sitting on the edge of the rooftop holding a cellphone and going through information about the rankers he defeated while thinking about what had occurred in the fights,
”Interesting" Shizu said as he was going through the contents of the cellphone "So I'm guessing this gift is supposed to be the equivalent to a biography of rankers, now why would, oh" He was interested by something "So these were their original equipment? I wonder why they aren't using them" He further looked into some of their story's "Depressing, sad, generic, unfortunate, tragic, standard, standard...Ah, here we go, let me see..." He was reading a certain person's history and then immediately shut the cellphone off afterwards "Well, that was an interesting read, I wonder why it won't let me see the others...Oh well" He got up from his position and began to walk toward the door "I didn't expect to see some of that...I wonder how those people got through that" When he was about to touch the door knob it was kicked opened and he was knocked back, which when he looked up to see who kicked it open it was River and she didn’t seem amused.
“Shizu!” She yelled while there was a manga book in her hand and a bit of blood coming out of her nose. He immediately knew what was going to happen next and just ran toward the edge of the building, pulled out 2 swords and jumped

-What happened earlier-

Katana and Shizu were alone in her room and she was handing him a sword with a strange looking handle, Shizu took it and unsheathed it, examining it closely
“Its one of my onii-chan’s swords, the jet sword, its what made him a great fighter and assassin, I hope you use this well” Shizu sheathed the blade and placed it to his side “But just a fair warning, its hard to use and my onii-chan was the only one master of it, but I think you can use it at the very least”
“Thanks for the vote of confidence” When he was about to get out of the room Katana stopped him.
“Wait, I forgot” She gave him a manga, a small device, a piece of paper, and a cellphone “You’re going to need this” Shizu examined all the items and for the manga, when he opened it his face went completely blank as the sound of his blood going down from his head to his legs might be heard. He handed it to Katana and just said,
“Give it to River and say it’s from me” She grabbed it,
“You know what’s going to happen, right?” She questioned
“There is a reason why you gave that to me, also I have this” He lifted up the jet-blade and she nodded in response
“Okay!” She smiled brightly
“Wow” Shizu thought “The amount of innocence that is beaming is blinding”

-Present time-

He placed the jetsword under him and used his other sword as a balance as he pressed the jet mechanism and he was flying through the air, though whatever he was trying to do fell flat when he was caught by a chain mid-flight and was dragged down onto the rooftop with a pissed off River holding a chain,
“Yo” Shizu said as River shoved the manga into his face onto a certain page, which Shizu’s eyes have been blinded “Oh…So this is why you’re pissed off”
“What is the meaning of this?!” River questioned threateningly
“I’m just having some fun, you know being less serious when I’m not in a ranked fight, like you said” He joked as River took the manga off his face, but then stared into his eyes like a predator
“So, you want to have fun eh?” She grinned a little and then pulled Shizu up forcefully and then started to drag him toward somewhere “I’ll show you fun”
“For some reason I have a bad feeling about this” He thought

-Johnny’s room-

The room was very dim and Johnny was working on something on his laptop while he was spinning on his rolling chair,
“So” He stopped himself from spinning and looked at the other 4 rankers available “What do you think?”
“What I think” Anna replied “This room is dark and makes us look a lot more sinister than it actual is”
“Sorry” Johnny responded “It’s how I work”
“Shizu” Joseph responded “I said this once and I will say it again, high chances he will make it far, but he still has to learn about certain things in order to not die early”
“Even so” Darwin said “He is resourceful with what he has”
“Bah” Anna said in a peeved tone “The guy really knows how to aggravate you”
“I respect him” Ryan said straightforwardly
“Now” Johnny said “With all of that said, why the hell did all of you give him an easy time!?”
“Don’t you dare-“ Anna was saying when Johnny said,
“Ones true essence comes when they fight with their all, it is an insult when you don’t even try that hard!”
“He did dare”
“I’m pretty sure Shizu noticed how he went through all of that way too easily, again, mind telling me why the heck you guys did that?!”
“I speak for us” Ryan said “And say that we weren’t motivated and we didn’t exactly have much to worry”
"This entire arc was one gigantic screwball, I swear, what in the world happened to everyone to lose their fighting spirit?”
“We all have our lives” Joseph replied “its not like we are required to go further than our current rank, which not only are you no exception, but that is the past, this is the present, and most of us have something better to do than beating the living crap out of each other like it was a fight club next to a fully-stocked armory”
“Tch, I know, I know…Hey wait a minute I don’t remember calling you up here!”
“I saw you guys going into the same room and thought I might join, also I was bored”
“Whatever, its not like a under-lying dark plot or anything” Johnny said while he started spinning again and hitting the ground when he spun to much “Is it just me or was this like a tutorial?”
“What do you mean?” Joseph questioned
“Sorry, but I’ll let you figure out what I mean, now I want to see how Shizu handles the spike in difficulty thanks to everyone from 101-91, you all have been quite helpful in developing this ranker!” He said sarcastically as he claps to match the sarcasm “Ah, the day he fights me for real is going to be fun!”
1311111111111111111112111.title: Observations, rewards, and a consequence

13111111111111111111121111.content:
“So” Shizu asked while he was still in that ‘fun place’ River dragged him to “Mind telling me when you get clearance to get special transport?”
“What clearance?” River questioned when she realized what she said and was about to change her words when Shizu said afterwards,
“I’m pretty sure you said something about that and-…Don’t tell me you actually lied about that”
“…” River was staring blankly, trying to think of something. Then Shizu face palmed
“So…Let me get this straight, all this time we literally could have been flying, not only saving time, but also resources” River just went deeper into her own mind and pretty much turned into a statue
“Eh…Um…I’m sorry…” She said with regret
“I guess it’s alright, we don’t use the money I won that much anyhow…So why did you do that?” River got out of her blank, statue state and actually said something,
“It would’ve been nice to know things about the person that I am going to hang around with for a long expanse of time, besides, we did all those fun stuff, meet some new people (In cases that don’t involve beating each other half to death), went between places we couldn’t have seen by plane alone…”
“And feeling the pain of getting beaten half to death” Shizu joked while River made a pissed of half-smile “Well I can see logic in that, which leads to this, do you happen to have a fear of flying? It’s okay if-“
“No I don’t” She replied quickly
“No offense, but I’m under the assumption that you’re-“Then Shizu got his lights knocked out. Before he went out completely, this was his last thoughts “Damn…did I just get hit by one punch man?” When he was left unconscious River had decided to carry his body to Katana’s room.

-Katana’s room-

Katana was snuggling up to Sora who was sleeping in the corner ignoring the loli for reasons that it is a waste of energy to even try. That was when the peace was broken when the sound of a door being kicked open was heard,
“Hey Sora, we’re going!” River yelled as Sora sprang up from his slumber accidentally knocking katana back
“Whoops, sorry” He replied as he was going to get out of the room, but found the door closed “Um…” Katana opened the door for him,
“Bye Sora, say I said bye to Shizu-san too and that don’t die out there!”
“I will!” Sora replied as he left the room and ran towards River. When they met up, he said “Um…That girl is supposed to be more than 18, right?”
“If I remember correctly” River answered
“Japan never ceases to amaze me” Then he noticed Shizu being carried “Wait what happened to-“
“He’s sleeping”

-Airport-

*Just for clarification, the plane transport isn't by standard transport, it's by private plane as there has been very bad tension between rankers and airport security...Seriously just their weapons alone...and the fact that they are pretty much 'trained killers' despite some of them completely opposite of that and also the fact that there really isn't really that many rankers if you compare it to everyone else which is just unfair to others. It's different for couriers as they are quite a few of them and are on separate terms with airport security*

Pretty much everyone was there to see Shizu and his group off toward their next fight, which the reason being is that after the hospital recovery all of them screwed around for a bit and had fun. Before they got on the flight, some people said their last words of encouragement or negativity and then the 2 groups went their separate ways, but more likely or not they might meet again…well some of them definitely will. Also, common courtesy.

Inside the plane Sora was sleeping in the corner of the plane as Shizu and River were sitting right beside each other. Before they could lift off Shizu noticed River shaking slightly and hanging onto the arm rests tightly
“Hey River, are you okay?” Shizu asked, knowing full well of her real emotion
“I’m just fine” She replied straightforwardly, but with a bit of nervousness in the tone which pained Shizu a lot as seeing her like this was not only new, but also something he really didn’t want to see. And with preparation if this was going to occur, he pulled out a syringe and injected it into River’s neck, which she reacted violently and almost one hit KO Shizu. She grabbed her neck and yelled “AH! What the hell was that for?!”
“Seeing you scared is something I don’t want to see (Which out of all of the things to be scared of…) also, effect will take place is a moment”
“What?” Shizu counted down from 5 with his fingers which of course the shorter time got the more River began to lose consciousness and then completely going to sleep which her head leaned on Shizu’s shoulder which shortly after she grabbed onto his arm
“Huh, she looks cute while sleeping” He poked her several times in the head to see how well the sedative worked, “Well that thing worked well…maybe too well…Hm…if this place was more private, I think I might’ve-“Before he could even finish, River made a frowning face and had held onto his arm hard enough to create a bone-crunching sound. Shizu made a silent pained face and kept his screaming in,
“Even when she’s sleeping!” He said in a pained voiced “What the heck are her strength parameters?!”

-Later-

Still in the flying in the plane with River still unconscious, Shizu was looking out while it was nighttime,
“So” He was thinking “It appears that the friendship (98) and love path (92) is set, like those two…I wonder how those will end” He looked at River again and patted her head “I think Katana had a term for someone like River…I can’t remember what it was…Anyhow” he looks out the window “I wonder what others think of the world. This place is beautiful, yet ugly at the same time, people see this place differently from biased views or open minds and each one can live for something for either themselves or for others of either their own accord or forced…Well I guess I’ll know when I get to them…I wonder where some of these people even came from…” He pulled out another syringe and just looked at it “I wonder where all of this is going to take me to the future…I wonder what’s going to get me first though” He fell asleep with River still holding on and his head leaned against hers.

Later on, the plane had finally landed at its destination…
13111111111111111111121111.title: Onwards...Unconsciously!

131111111111111111111211112.content:
Scotland…honestly the only thing I know about this place is its alcohol, kilts, the color green, gingers and bagpipes…now with that aside…

At the airport entrance Shizu was yet again carrying all of the luggage, but at least it was quite minor as it was only his own backpack and another case which held all of their swords.
“So” Shizu began “Why are we waiting here?”
“Transport” River replied as a certain vehicle made a comeback
“Wait, isn’t that-“ Shizu said while pointing at the vehicle as 2 couriers walked out of it and threw the keys at Shizu
“Yes it is…It’s the RV we rode for about…honestly I lost track how long we were riding it”
“Um, just for clarification, after the next fight where are we going?”
“America”
“Seems like a waste of resources transporting this, doesn’t it?”
“We have solar powered planes you know” Shizu gave a questioning stare
“Wait, since when-“
“And we have to use this thing for something, now let’s get to the Scottish highlands!” Everyone hopped into the RV and got hit with nostalgia
“River, you drive, I have no clue where the highlands are”
“Said the guy who was a wanderer”

-Scottish highlands-

Well the only thing I have to say is that the landscape looks amazing and one of the things that makes the world beautiful…In other words, there is green everywhere with rising hills and mountains and rivers with the sunlight only amplifying it. Also, don’t forget the stone buildings…a lot of stone buildings…and that big castle…
“River, with the amount of space this place has, what happened to just landing right in the middle of all of this?” Shizu questioned
“Scenic route” River replied.

At that moment Shizu was looking out the window and saw the highland castle, one of the top 7 combat schools in the world. One thing for sure to know was that it was huge and it stretched far with semi-high walls, big stone structures, and don’t forget the giant cannons that lay around the place like it was fort Knox medieval version with people wielding gun-blades everywhere.
“Oh this looks…“ Shizu was admiring the architecture which at least it fit the environment nicely “So….Where is this person?” The vehicle suddenly stopped as River looked back and just pointed out the window
“There” River was pointing at the mouth of a valley where there was a single person planting something into the ground. Shizu was examining the area around that person and made a conclusion,
“Well then, this looks like a fighting ground set by the ranker themselves, well then” He opened the case and got out two sheathes, his reflection and jet sword, put them to his waist and he dropped his backpack “No one get near my position until the fight’s over” He said before leaving the RV and walking toward the mouth of the valley.
“We could’ve just dropped him off, what is he trying to do, look at the scenery some more before it ignites like a warzone?” Sora said while he was outside observing the gap between them and the ranker in the valley
“Sora, you have no idea how right you are”
“Why?” Sora asked confused
“You’ll see why, also let us watch the fireworks that are about to start”

While walking through the valley Shizu was observing everything, the slope of the rising hills, the amount of almost undetectable foreign objects in the ground (Dynamite wire sticking out and also small tubing), the sunlight, and even the castle in the background. When he approached the ranker (Tall, slight build, blonde hair in a Dutch braid and brown eyes. Wearing flak jacket and reinforced brownish pants and shoes) she was carrying a compact mini-version of a swarm of bees behind her back while holding a pistol with an elongated barrel to fit an axe and she was crouching and putting something into the ground.

Both fighters were at a fair distance away from each other, and she still had her back to him.
“Hey” Shizu said and the ranker got up from her crouching position and looked back
“Yes?” She replied, which she had a…well let’s call it a Dutch accent.
“What’s with the set-up of this place?”
“Oh this, what you are standing on right now is a training area to test one’s instinct…Or how fast they can run when they realized they just stepped onto a trap”
“So, I’m guessing this was set up for me specifically”
“With the amount of explosives set up and flares…Yes it is”
“Shizu Irie” He replied as he pulled out both blades
“Amanda Juko“ she placed her swarm of bee’s onto the ground “Also a warning…” The bottom of her swarm of bees had ignited and started smoking white which another hissing sound could be heard “Watch where you step, or else you’ll probably lose your legs” Her weapon had fired and had shot out sticks of dynamite along with some white substance. When the white substance hit certain parts of the ground, it had ignited the live wires and had detonated the dynamite below ground. Around the area, it had turned into the equivalent to a mine field with multiple reactions one after another…
131111111111111111111211112.title: Scottish highland

1311111111111111111112111121.content:
-From a spectators view-

“Ho-ly shit” Sora said after he saw the large amount of explosives detonating “River, what’s with the giant gap between these groups of rankers?”
“Well, that is what happens when people hold back (Or not use their original gear) people can get the wrong idea”
“Aren’t you worried about what is going to happen to Shizu? I know he’s strong, but he still is human and those are still explosives, and he isn’t built like a tank!” River shrugged
“Well, I’m not worried about him losing, I’m just worried about him losing a limb, also despite you being his friend, I’m shocked you don’t have faith”
“Look, I do have faith, but do you even know what he has in his backpack, do you even know what his problem is?”
“I know that he has a crap-ton of drugs in his backpack, so is he addicted to something?” She joked
“Not even remotely! The things he uses are strictly for combat usage-"
"Unless he's shooting it out of a dart gun, the sedative he used is not going to be that 'combat usage'"
"...Okay most of them are"
“So, what is the problem he has?”
“I’m just going to say this, there is a specific reason why he carries all those syringes (And no it’s not an addiction!) there is a specific reason why he usually leaves people with the least amount of damage, heck there is a reason for everything he does no matter what!”
“You intrigued me Sora, mind telling me more?”
“Take it up with Shizu I said enough!”

-Back to the fight-

After the smoke from the gunpowder and white phosphorous cleared up Shizu had moved far away from where Amanda was. The area where the explosions had started had reduced the once green area into a warzone in a matter of seconds.
“That was close!” Shizu said as he gripped his jet-sword harder “I’m still not confident on my skills with this new blade, how did its predecessor handle such a weapon?”
“Hey Shizu, watch where you’re stepping!”
“Huh?” Shizu looked down and saw one of the tube’s sticking out. “Oh-!” He rolled out of the way as a stream of fire came up from it. But as he rolled into a new area he was blasted back by another dynamite which apparently had a short fuse. “This place is-“
“You know, for a person who was a wanderer, your danger instinct is surely lacking!” She set up her his main weapon like a mortar and started shoving dynamite down it “Fire in the hole!” She started firing dynamite as Shizu started running toward her, being wary of the ground and the dynamite flying toward his position. But then there was an explosion under him as he was launched back yet again into the vicinity of the dynamite launched. “Oh this is not even-!” He ran again and was blown back by the explosion. At that point Shizu was definitely getting his butt handed to him and he was not only getting worn out, but he was receiving a lot of injuries, mostly to his legs, but overall he is getting smashed. He pulled out a couple syringes to numb the pain and increase the healing process.
“This woman is giving me a run for my money here” He stood up and shook his head “But even so” He sheathed his jetsword and pulled out something from his backpack and pointed it at Amanda “She is still not as strong as ‘her’”
“A pistol…I wonder why he isn’t firing yet” Amanda thought as she loaded in another volley of dynamite “Just in case…” She fired again which Shizu aimed and, despite having limited experience with guns, managed to hit 1, causing a chain reaction, but something was wrong when white substance had started to fall from the sky
“Is that-?!” Shizu ran as when the white substance hit the ground it detonated the dynamite below. Shizu didn’t come out unscathed as he was hit by just a few of the ‘white substance’, but found it to be burning his skin “Crap, why does she even have that?” He turned around and noted the distance between him and her, which was quite far. He brought his reflection sword and gun forward which he prepared for another charge despite the continuous injuries he was sustaining.
“I admire your tenacity swordsman, but you can’t beat with that kind of instinct!” She adjusted her weapon and aimed it straight into the sky "Again with this" Shizu thought as he ran at her, but only to be faced with her weapon splitting into two, giving it two different area's of attack "Oh what the heck" She fired a volley of dynamite from the part at the ground.

Somehow, with skill and precision, he managed to cut the fuses of the dynamite before they could explode, making them harmless. Surprised as what she saw, she slammed her swarm of bees down onto the ground and a white smoke came out of it. Before Shizu could even reach her she fired one last volley, but this was different as it was in a form of some sort of gas as when it fired it gradually covered the place in a grey smoke. Immediately Shizu put on his rebreather (Equivalent to a gasmask in this case) and put away his pistol
“What kind of smokescreen is this?” He sheathed his reflection sword and brought out his jet-sword “With this amount of smoke…Wait a minute this isn’t-!” After realizing what this ‘smoke’ was he got on his jetsword and tried to get out of it, and while outside of the smoke-screen’s range, Amanda Juko was holding a cluster of dynamite and was lighting the fuse,
“The test results for your abilities, Shizu Irie, is that you failed” She threw it and when it made contact with the smoke it ignited incredibly quickly and it turned into a wall of flame. While staring she just thought about certain things about her life and decided to compare to Shizu in several aspects. After snapping out of it she continued looking at the fire and thought “I’m pretty sure I overdid” She picked up her hive of bees and was about to walk away when the sound of wind blowing was heard. She looked back to see something flying from the top of the blazing fire and head toward her. “What the hell is that?!” She brought out her main weapon and was about to fire, but the ‘projectile’ was too fast for her and as a last resort she used it as a shield while she used her pistol-axe to shoot the projectile coming at her. Both the main weapon and the projectile clashed with each other resulting in the weapon breaking and the projectile hitting its mark.

Amanda was knocked back far and then ragdolled for a little bit before stopping. The ‘projectile’ that hit her was now kneeling down, injured and burned, using his jet-sword as the only thing keeping him up and his other sword was laying down near him. Amanda looked up one last time before she noticed something off with Shizu,
“So…His life was like the others…This world really is brutal” The thing she noticed with Shizu was amplified by the fire going on behind him, which just died out “I think I hear something hissing…” Before she could even react to escaping from her own trap, Shizu suddenly grabbed her and started dragging her around while running and avoiding all traps possible “Hey, what are you doing?!”
“Getting out of this area and then beating you in a place where it’s more fair, you cheap little- BAH!” While he was yelling at Amanda, Shizu stepped on a short-fuse dynamite trap and went flying along with Amanda “How many traps did you put in?!” Shizu landed perfectly and basically just ignored all types of caution and ran at full speed, again pulling Amanda along like a ragdoll
“This entire valley is one giant hotspot!”
“Are you kidding me?! That was overkill!”
“Hey, I had to put my surplus of supplies somewhere!”
“Why did you even have that much in the first place?!” Then out of all of the places he ran into, it had to be one where there were metal tubing everywhere, which turned into a flamingo dance of death. “Who in the world even thought of this?!”
“Is this how you drag a lady around?!”
“Said the person who turned this place into a practical Michael Bay film! A simply match in a valley wasn’t enough? The environmentalists are going to be on our cases for this!” After running for quite a while Amanda made a observation,
“Wait how are you running with your injuries!?”
“ADRENALINE RUSH! (Also don’t forget the morphine and HP+ from earlier)” Shizu yelled loudly as both were yelling incoherent dialogue as they were both being overlapped by the explosions. Also two things: A lot of explosives in this valley and Shizu walked a far distance apparently.

-Later-

People found Shizu and Amanda, which Amanda was knocked out cold (Or should I say hot) and Shizu was on his last legs, out of stamina, and very much injured. He was considered the winner of the match and both of them were taken to the castle infirmary (What? Did you expect the ranked boundaries to be the only people to put this guy in the hospital?) Later River said,
“Hey look, he didn’t lose a limb”
“At least he is in one piece…I hope” Sora commented

#91: Amanda Juko
#90: Shizu Irie
1311111111111111111112111121.title: Wolf and death valley

14.content:
Again, this is not necessary or mandatory to read, but this is more for organization use just in case I forget something or someone wants to add on and doesn't want to wait for me to finish the storyline. Also note that not all of them have some well-done story. Some are long, some are short, some are complete, half-assed, rushed stuff or are simple...very...very...simple. So basically some of them are going to get over-hauled in the near future.

Ranked Bio: The 101 ranked fighter Bio

Other Characters: Essentially everyone else. Whether part of other character's plotline, the world itself, or here just because they are here
14.title: Ranked-Bio

141.content:
Ranked 101: Jerry Jenkins
Description: Average height, skinny, white, wearing grey plastic sweatpants, grey hoodie that is up, grey running shoes, and has is wearing a wooden mask. Also he has a lot of scars...and I mean ALOT.
Nationality: American
Weapon: Knives/daggers, kunai, shuriken, and pretty much any small throwing projectile.
Special: Knows many different techniques involving throwing weapons and hand-to-hand
Fact: Originally ranked 10 and almost always holds back. You see his true strength if he knows you are strong.

Move-set: Like I said, he has a large array of throwing weaponry, but be warned, he is a deadly one and is the first person that will be fought if you pick free-world
-Electrical blades that will either have a electrical AOE release or stunning effect depending if it makes impact or not
-Explosive blades that either will have a fragmentation effect
-Poison blades that either poison you, wearing you down, or paralyze you
-Standard blades that's only effect is cutting you and being stuck on you
-Blade storm, which is Jerry's special, which he throws a storm of blades at you
-Grey shadow killer, another special, he disappears in a cloud of smoke and several 'smoke shadows' come out to attack you. Watch it, all of them can actually do damage and he may come in from behind for a large amount of damage.

Bio: Jerry Jenkins is a teacher/trainer at a combat school, and quite a ball-busting one at that with a great reputation, this man has a large reputation of breeding either well-trained fighters, which their profession massively varies, or ranked individuals. This person will not take just anyone and this person is BRUTAL in his training regiment, in fact you would probably die if you train with him. This person has a dark past which that mask hides and from what others say, he was part of an elite group of specialists of some sort, but then something happened and most of them were slaughtered with he himself being mortally wounded, though the fact that he is still standing kind of kills the mortally wounded part...Anyhow he has a lot of bad memories.

Possible battle location: The combat school or one of his many dangerous training regiment sites.

Note: Never fight this guy in a forest, jungle, or anyplace with lots of cover, YOU WILL BE SCREWED.
141.title: 101: Back to school

1411.content:
Ranked: Leo Branchurias
Description: Tall, average build, blonde, blue eyes, white. Wearing rubber boots, gloves, yellow raincoat and goggles
Nationality: Canadian
Weapon: Metal pole, monkey wrench and a metal L-pipe with a valve near where the pipe bends.
Special: A special electrical force coursing through his veins
Fact: Leo has a immunity against electricity, the stuff he is wearing is reinforced so it counts as armor, very light armor

Move-set: Some simple attacks that can be a normal or special depending if the weapons he have has an electrical build-up. Also for the electrical attacks he either removes his gloves or sticks them into electric outlets.
-Electric pole, his metal pole becomes electrified which deals more damage and causes shock effect
-Electric pipe, his pipe becomes electrified, watch it, he can shoot from that thing, fire 'electric bombs', and the valve regulates the amount of electric output
-Electric wrench, ouch
-Electric punch, electrified unarmed attacks, ouch!
-Electric overload, Leo is completely engulfed with electricity and if you are carrying a melee weapon and that makes contact with his weapon it is going to be some awesome electrical light show (Though death is high, still awesome)

Bio: This person is far from normal as he had attained a curse of a power. He continuously emits a strong electrical force so he wears special gear to keep the electricity under control. Another thing is that this person had fought local gangs as a vigilante and actually took out the largest gang around his town making a domino effect that wiped out most of the crime. Of course this man is usually hunted down by remnants of the original gangs and most have been unsuccessful. Funny enough, the place that he had made his base was originally the base of the largest gang, an abandoned power plant which for some reason has the tendency to have intense snow storms around it.


Battleground: You would most likely find him at the electric power plant that he lives in which is now semi-operational, just be careful of flooded electrical areas.
1411.title: 100: Electrical Dysfunction

14111.content:
Rank 99: Natalie Creshaw
Description: Average height, skinny, red hair tied In a skull hairclip, brown-eyes, white. Wearing red and white boots, skirt and shirt.
Nationality: Swiss
Weapon: Laser sniper rifle (Exactly what it says, it looks very metallic and has a nuclear symbol on the hilt)
Special: Lasers, enough said.
Fact: She hate's to lose, she really hate's to lose.

Move-set: Again another simple attack pattern with basic sniper tactics. Besides the simple individual lasers...
-Focus shot, the sniper rifle charges and unleashes a giant laser beam, easy to dodge, but good luck finding cover that isn't destroyed.
-Rapid fire, though a lot weaker than the regular attack, the sniper turns into a machine gun. Indicator when the rifle is shaking.
-Double-shot, essentially the regular attack times 2 in quick succession, there is no indicator.

Bio: The reason why she is called the boundary sniper is that whenever this woman is hired to do something it's usually at a defensive position and she does a pretty good job at it. Overall this person's past is nothing special, what's interesting is her profession of technology and her involvement in the construction of laser-type technology. This person essentially created the base weapon for laser weaponry which is the customized weapon she is carrying now, other variations have been created and the most notable achievement is the nuclear sword (Only 1 in existence)

Battleground: Somewhere that involves a giant wall or fence with a high security area.
14111.title: 99: Boundary sniper

141111.content:
Rank 98: Joseph Steghorn
Description: Average height, slight build, brown medium-length hair, black eyes. Wearing green and brown military-like uniform with a rebreather.
Nationality: Ukrainian
Weapon: Customized flechette gun. A gun that shoots metal darts that can be used underwater and is silent, it has an alternate mode where it transforms into a minigun with 3 rotating barrels...yeah. Also a diving knife.
Special: Effective underwater combatant
Fact: This man is one of the most unluckiest people on the rankings list.

Move-set: Though best underwater, he can still kick your crap in.
-Trade ammunition, for the darts it can be switched from normal to poison, for the minigun rounds it can be switched from normal to incendiary to explosive.
-Underwater tactics: Very maneuverable, I'm just going to say that.

Bio: Although he was born in Ukraine, he had never stayed in the same place for more than a year and so he continually had to lose friends for one reason or another (And he wasn't spoiled with technology so there was that) With the childhood situation out of the way we now move to his adult hood which he had joined the military. The unfortunate part happened when his plane had crashed into a swamp and he and a few others were stuck there. The most ominous part was that the swamp was filled with all kinds of creatures that want to kill them and the 'swamp guardian' that was basically what kept killing them.

So he ended up as one the survivors of the swamp and he never returned to the military. On a side note a rescue party did come, but they all died. After he got out of the swamp he ended up working near the coast as a scavenger and, on another side note, he doesn't get a break near the coast as all kinds of crap happens.

Battleground: More than likely at the beach he works on, very rarely for him to be in the cursed swamped he crashed into earlier.
141111.title: 98: Pressurized darts

1411111.content:
97: Marco Sand
Description: Average height, slight build, shaved black hair, brown eyes, darkened skin and wearing a rolled up white long-sleeve T-shirt (Splattered with blood), blue jeans, and leather gloves.
Nationality: Salvadorian
Weapon: Custom .500 S&W Magnum, can also dual wield it and there is another version where it can multiples barrels (To be more exact, 12 barrels)
Special: He has a incredibly fast shooting and reloading rate
Fact: He has never lost in a game of Russian Roulette...never

Move-set: Although the attack pattern is simple, he has a trick up his sleeve
-6 shot, immediately shoot 6 bullets in 1 second
-Roulette, 1 bullet, 6 chances, with each time the bullet doesn't shoot the total damage increases, when the bullet shoots it somehow becomes more powered
-Trade ammunition, frag rounds
-Motion revolve, the special reason why he is ranked, if he 'revolves' the barrel multiple times it can push out the bullets with such force it looks like a laser due to the bullet trail

96: Franco Gambit
Description: Tall, slim, slicked back black hair, moustache, brown eyes, white and dressed like a card dealer with gloves that are reinforced.
Nationality: Italian
Weapon: Metal cards. Also has a gun which utilizes metal cards, which either fires them off in a faster rate or shreds time to shoot fragments.
Special: He is good at throwing cards
Fact: It quite often happens that he would accidentally use metal cards instead of regular cards in normal card matches...the results are kindof obvious.


Move-set: Quite a special attack pattern, besides the average throwing cards
-Card spread, throwing several cards horizontally
-Full-house, throwing the entire deck of cards in a dangerous close spread...you will probably die instantly
-Rapid deal, holding the entire deck in one hand and just flick quickly
-Prism card, on one side this can magnify the effects of energy based attacks, the other side it can reduce that damage significantly

Joint move-set:
-Prism revolver, using motion revolve and prism card, the single 'laser' can turn into a death beam light show
-Shrapnel, using 6 shot and any move of Franco, whether normal or special, there will be metal card shrapnel of varying types.

Bio: Back in his hometown, Marco was not in the best of positions. He would steal and kill to survive and somehow he ended up being the leader of a roving band of bandits. They eventually worked up to get supplies and the money to leave their town and out into the world to become even stronger in both their numbers and supplies (Or in this case weaponry) and then Marco encountered Franco...

Franco was apart of a family of mobsters and his father, who loved him with all his heart, had taught him the family business and the art of gambling. That was where he gained his ability of throwing cards and his art of deception. But unlike Marco the mobster family had fallen and most of them died when Franco was a teenager and he was essentially drove away from his home in fear of dying. Then somehow he managed to go over sea's and into California where he had met a special friend...

The first encounter was a fight which ended when Marco had cards in his legs and after chatting they hit it off and it turned into a very good friendship that wasn't built on deception. Speaking of, as a way to gain wealth both of them combined their powers and opened a casino with the gang being turned into dealers and guards. Ranked 95: Markus Desola
Description: Average height, slight build, black short hair, brown eyes, darkish skin. Wearing blue cargo pants, black shoes, and a blue and white shirt that looks likes he was ran over with them on. May also appear in the form of being decked out in some strong armor.
Nationality: Portuguese
Weapon: Chairs (Although he can just grab any old chair, he is always carrying a special metal chair that is apparently indestructible according to him)
Special: The fact that he uses chairs is special enough
Fact: This guy has an odd obsession with chairs and other furniture

Move-set: This guy has a special fighting technique regarding chairs...this one is going to need a play-by-play on what he does with them
-Depending on the type of chair, he will slam the chair on top of your or on a wall and either go in unarmed or smash the chair legs on you
-If the chair is planted flat on the ground he will go in for unarmed attacks while holding on to it.
-He throws the chair/smashes it on top of you
-He can smash the chair itself, requirement is if it can break easily, and use certain parts as makeshift swords or shields.
-Chair gun: Apparently he used to have a chair that had the ability to shoot bullets and rockets
-Vanguard: Apparently that he also had another chair for usage being double defense.

Bio: As much as it's interesting to know where his obsession came from, it's actually unknown, what is known is how he figured out how to utilize a chair as a weapon. Whenever there is a fight this man would pick up the nearest thing to him and use it as a makeshift weapon, which was a chair, and he got into a lot of fights and so he figured that he practice using a chair and somehow he created a fighting style. As you can see of his position that style of fighting was successful. Funny enough this guy can also do many tricks with chairs whether balancing acts or some acrobatics relating to it, which this is some entertainment that one doesn't see all that much...or at least how he does it.

Battleground: For whatever reason you would either find him in a furniture store or someplace with an abundance of chairs.

Rank 91: Katana Shimanouchi
Description: Very short, skinny, long black hair with a black ribbon, white, black eyes. Usually wearing something black whether a black cloak or a black lollita dress.
Nationality: Japanese
Weapon: Damascus katana, kunai, shurikens, chain blades.
Special: Turning invisible and amazing reflexes.
Fact: Originally ranked 9th and in the original design she wasn't even in here, her brother, Kazuya Shimanouchi, was.

Move-set: Besides the backstabs and death from absolute nowhere...
-Joint-lock, throwing a kunai or shuriken into your joints to prevent movement
-Tainted blades, apply poison to weaponry, can cause sickness or paralysis and may result of a sword going through your throat
-Cloak and dagger, of course you know that Katana can turn invisible, but did you know her weapons can turn invisible? To be precise, even when she isn't invisible, her weapons can individually be invisible so basically invisible projectiles are scary.
-Bullet bound, she can reflect most projectiles, but not all of them so using a machine gun is perfectly fine. Thankfully she can't aim trajectory.
-Chained down, using the chainblades to restrict/limit your movement, the worst of it comes when they are invisible.

Bio: (Ryan) Funny enough, this man was actually hired, at one point, to kidnap Katana and take her to a certain location. Needless to say that had failed and it wasn't the brother that wrecked him, it was Katana because he had received very flawed information of her abilities which lead to his defeat and a stab to his pride. From his failure he had decided to, on his word and reputation as a mercenary, swore loyalty to her and that he will not harm her, in fact he would protect her. At first there was skepticism, but after a while that disappeared as, he may be a cold mercenary, but he is a man of his word. Here is a note on how he lost, he went in without weaponry, as he wasn't going to harm someone that looks like a little girl, and was going to do it non-lethally...as you can see this person has morals and is one of those people that does what they do to survive.

Bio: (Darwin) Kazuya's best friend and, of course, one of his most trusted. This person was once a leader of a large gang, to be exact, one of their branches in Canada. He was a special gang leader as he was only there due to his leadership skills and the fact that he doesn't need protection from normal people. The day that he left was when he got a call from Kazuya for a special favor, which as being a good friend left his position of gang leader to his best friends position. Immediately after his absence the Canadian gang branch he was commanding had fallen to a small number of individuals, which it wasn't the lack of leadership, it was the strength of that group. Never the less, he was never hunted down by the international gang...as far as official records go.

Bio: (Anna) Kazuya's...eh...I guess you can say girlfriend (?). The day they met was quite a funny one to begin with. It was when Kazuya was hired to assassination someone in the woods, which it wasn't Anna, it just so happens that person he was after was in the vicinity of her. Anyhow, even with his training of being one of the best assassins that has ever lived he ended up being ensnared by one of her many traps and that led to...so many things. How she fits into all of this is when Kazuya needed people to protect her sister when he went out and...out of hesitation called Anna up. Overall in terms of protection he didn't regret it, but the moments with each other in private and public were just so...weird, yet funny, though sometimes awkward in many ways.

Bio (Katana): Interesting enough the only reason why she is an assassin is due to the family she was born in, which the family business was the art of assassination. When she was a child she had first watched her first anime and loved it when started a chain of events that involved continuously reading manga and anime for most of her spare time from childhood to the present. Also in case if you didn't notice, her growth was stunted since elementary and she has yet to...develop. Not only that, but with the combination of anime and her child-like everything this can only be described in two words, kawaii and loli. At a very young age she was introduced to the art of assassinations, which she disliked, but was forced to in fear of getting her anime and manga cut off. But then, from a certain event, she doesn't involve herself in assassinations that much anymore.

This person had essentially turned into an embodiment of hate and blood lust and when he got out he went on a rampage and hunted down those who abandoned him in the underground.

Fact: Before you say that this person is evil, he does give you warnings to get out of his swamp before he comes in to slaughter you. Problem? The swamp is huge, you can get lost easily, and some people crash landed here...Yeah this person doesn't give a crap who you are and would just smash you for trespassing.

-Roots of death, roots will come up from underground, grab your legs, and would drag you under. Better be quick with the cutting!
-Vine-yard. vines would come and latch onto you/ getting in your way and would either result in annoying you, slowing you down, etc.
-Water burst, if Garfield slams his hammer down into the ground, the swamp water would forcefully burst upward and continue this pattern toward you, quite easy to dodge actually, if this makes contact you will either be forcefully dragged under with the water or be knocked back
-Water break, if you are too close to Garfield he will slam the bottom handle of the hammer into the ground and a wall of water would suddenly come up, this will only knock you back

Warning: Despite most of his fighting ability being related to the swamp, this person still has a crushing amount of skill and strength, also even while he is submerged waist deep in swamp water WITH that heavy equipment he is still fairly fast, can you imagine how fast this guy when you REALLY piss him off in a certain terrain?!


Background: This man's past is shrouded in complete mystery and even what he does in the swamp is speculation, but what the swamp originally had is not. The swamp that he is in was originally home to several large settlements of some sort of cult of sorts and several military outposts. Although speculation, it was believed that Garfield was either a guardian of the cult, a demonic entity summoned by the cult, or one of the tribesman guardians that were powerful and was pissed of the intrusion of the cultists and military personnel. Needless to say the last time anyone checked every single person in the swamp had either died, went missing, or got out as evidence of the abandoned settlements and outposts. It's unknown what the cultists did or what the military was even doing there.

Over the years people had wandered in out of curiosity or wanted to see if anything of value was in there and most didn't come out. Also there was several reports of aircraft crashing into the swamp with many of their passengers going missing with out of all of them very few accounted made it out alive with some horrible tales.

Move-set: Fighting style that changes based on person and weapon changes.
Original personality, more for precision and defensive strategy. -Original shape
Aggressive personality (Ira), a lot more reckless, yet unrelenting attacks and power increase -Double-blade staff-type
Child-like personality (Kawai) Absolutely no fighting experience what-so-ever -Literally just a stick...Would you attack her?
Lazy personality (Samakoro), overall more dodge and evasion moveset, but watch it if you piss him off while he's asleep. -Staff shaped
Older figure personality (Alter) Overall a lot more skill and discipline -Sword-sized
Psychopath personality (Kuroshi), the most unpredictable and dangerous -Knife sized (May have 2 of the)
Needy personality (Yokai ) Moreover, will not stay off your arse while attacking (Unrelenting) - Extendable mode


Background: Even when he was a child he was a complete shut-in and very anti-social. From his childhood until his teenage years, all he did inside was interact with his own multiple personalities, draw pictures, read books, write literature, tried his hand in manga and spent much time watching whatever interested him, which was anime. Now he has gained a reputation with how great his art and literature is. Aside from his success, he himself hardly has any social skills nor any life skills (Yet his other personalities actually know some, so he let's them handle it, for the most part) he is also labeled 'not even human' by many people, but those who encounter him first hand and actually interact are his closest friends. Also he lives by himself (Sort of) and he usually sits in a dark room all day and night.

Another thing to know is, with all that time he had become a very philosophical person and has been incredibly brutal with his honesty, yet he still cares.

One more thing:
Ira is a female who is incredibly aggressive and would tear you limb to limb to protect her and her personality comrades
Kawai is also a female and the child of the personalities and is all that, when this person is out, expect moe and kawaii flowing out like a river
Samakoro is the sloth who would fall asleep anywhere, even standing up, this person really doesn't care and is good if the user has insomnia. For some reason this guy is also philosophical.
Alter is the military/ father figure that whips people into discipline, when he applies order, he applies it hard with a hammer.
Kuruoshi is the bloodthirsty maniac with principles that would now come out when it is killing time...or he is bored...
Yokai is the person that, if she likes you, will be on you like glue (Unless personalities change)

Also note that his appearance changes depending on the personality that he is switched to. It can be something simple like hair color, hair style, and eye color or something complex like completely changing appearance in height, gender, etc. And because his clothing is special it may also change.

Bio: In the army he was a tactician on the field and in practice he was quite a good shot. Unfortunately he wasn't the best in the combat field, at first, as he would shake with his gun out and he would flinch at loud noises. Normally under normal circumstances this man would've been sent out or killed the first few days if it weren't for the squad he was on. On the squad he was on, all of them had difference backstories, strengths, and weaknesses, and they would all socialize and get to know each other to see how they tick and know how to handle them. They would do their best to make sure they would see each other get out of warfare...but...this is war and it has no mercy. One by one, they all fell in different styles and times of war. Some quick and painless, other's slow and in massive pain, somehow Caleb managed to pull through it all with the help of his fallen comrades. With the remaining members of the squad, it was disbanded, in his path he stood a stand to be a leader and strived on to make sure the squad he was in would have the best chance to come back on their two legs, not in a bag,

Thus began the legend of the old hero, a war hero that has been an incredible squad leader with very well thought-out plans and strategy. In war, it never changes, and those in it change. For better, or for worse, they strive to survive the battlefield.

Squad 14...REST IN PEACE (Note that not all of them died and red for emphasis)
Caleb Price - The tactician who began without a pair of balls and came out with a steel pair...of guns
Coeur Various - a deaf sniper that should be considered a rifleman due to the rifle he used, but he far surpassed the skill of people with snipers in abilities. Plus he refused to use a scope because 'I raise my head too much'
Solada Kovitche - a signaler or radio operator who was very good at interpreting and intercepting enemy radio signals. Also she knew several languages including hand signs.
Kirill Sokolov - The Officer and only swordsman you will ever meet in a war, crazy enough to bring a sword to a gun fight and actually win. This man, with his blade of steel, will instill fear in people so much that tanks and helicopters will run while he is chasing them...which actually happened. Also, Russians are crazy.
Reiki Archer - The most badass medic that has ever lived and is crazy enough to do it with a shotgun while he is stitching someone's wound.
Jan Croat - A Captain with a clean-freak problem which holy crap is it a problem.
Zaila Ziegfri - Demolitionist carrying a surplus of explosives and instead of being crazy with them she is precise.
Silver Rauler - Engineer, pilot, tank operator...overall the driver that won't kill you by accident or annoy you.
Ayame Endo - The scout with some insane eye-sight strength, she has even better sight than the sniper, and holy heck you cannot be any more agile than this!

The reason why she hides her profession from other's is because it is a bit embarrassing and may have others question her profession and her own person. (Alexey Kuznetsov): Was once a long guard of a giant metal wall that had separated two powers for many years. Though he may be the lone guard, because of his over-casting intimidating figure no one has dared to even look at him as his appearance alone struck fear in the people on that side of the wall. The one random thing I have to say is that this guy must be good at poker facing because even in snowstorms and blizzards he is going to stand there like nothing is going on, seriously, when does this guy eat or go to the restroom?! In other news the only reason why he moved is because Ivan approached him the minute he got into town.

(Vera Orlov): Not only is her skill recognized by other hunters, even before the 101 was set up, she also had a very good and strong relationship with most if not all of them. One thing to know about this guy is that this person is one of those people that really isn't serious, which he is more free-will and optimistic with a bit of weirdness in there.

Bio: Jade was born into a rich family, but due to his nature he didn't fit in to the rich life-style at all and he went off on his own at the age of 15, unfortunately for him his sister followed him mainly because she liked him a lot more than the other family members. For several years they hardly ever separated and they had survived and thrived in the real world. Within this time span they had encountered many people, some becoming friends, some enemies, and some neutral. Both of them had become incredibly skilled in fighting, but Jade surpassed farther than his sister in combat ability just for the purpose of protecting her, also he gained other skills under certain circumstances.

Then one day they had arrived at an abandoned castle, which was rather shoddy, but dang big, it was quite interesting and all kinds of crap happened. For one reason or another both had decided to stay for an extended period of time after cleaning up house. After that extended period of time, somehow, that castle became the grounds for a combat academy (Which not only became one of the best one's, but also one of the more dangerous ones as YOU DO NOT SCREW WITH THE TEACHERS) which might've been by some of the friends they had invited...Or how the guys that were there are gun-blade crazy and respected these 2 like they were the god of gun-blades, except they didn't look like they ran into a costume shop that was recently hit by paintball WWIII.

For Jade he didn't stay for long and he mysteriously disappeared into the world once again, this time without his sister. The last thing he left was a golden medallion of a wolf on one side and a Gemini on the other.

Story: Lily loves to fight. No matter the odds at hand and no matter how strong the person is, she would always go in head on, rashly, brashly, and disregarding safety to fight with all her skill and might. So she volunteered to be apart of an experimental weapons attachment which was by a well-known and highly acclaimed weapons engineer with assistance from an equally known and acclaimed medical expert. Overall, as you can see, that experiment was successful and Lily was very satisfied with her increased strength. Now she is fighting people to see who can best her on a fair and equal field. By the way the blades aren't always there as they can come from, oh I don't know, her automail!

He is really a person who embraces and loves life, it's just that he not only doesn't fit in with it, everything pretty much dies around him (Sometimes literally, but mostly metaphorically) So basically everyone around him would stay very far away from him in fear of being sent into a state of depression, dying, or getting their atmosphere wrecked.

He is born from a family of reapers and gravekeepers. They know only death and knows no compassion, only the beginning of life and the end of it. They fear no death, they bring it, they have no fear, they are it, they are the personification of death and the harbingers of it. Thus, he is like this, but he is a rarity of which one doesn't want to bring death and fear into others, because he has emotion and feelings, but unfortunately his reputation, appearance, and family are all that stands. After an incident where the weapon he is wielding right now was somehow stolen that caused one of the biggest tragedies ever seen. Since that day, he disappeared with both the nuclear sword and all the prototypes and plans of it. Story: Marek is an expert observer and astronomer, along with high marks in several fields in science he is also a believer in aliens (But he is not one of those super-crazy alien-buff guys) thus why he is doing what he does. One day while working in his personal observatory he had saw and tracked 8 different UFO's that had crash-landed. Of course as a curious person he had prepared his equipment for the worst and went to the closest one and that is when he discovered a crashed metallic-alloy capsule that had alien-parts in it which became the basis of his ultimate shield. The rest of his time was spent looking for these artifacts, but not without facing the military and other organizations...he managed to scrounge up 2 other artifacts, but the others he wasn't able to. He is still wondering on who had procured the others, but by simply looking at the rankings he could guess who could possible have an artifact.

Also if you're wondering why he is in space (The moon) I am adding emphasis on how much he hates people.

Nationality: ???

Story: It's unknown who Killian once was, but what could be assumed is that he has gone through the darklands and lived. The darklands is a special place that you can only enter when you die and in certain conditions. (Or a master at opening dimensional portals) Those conditions is when you die unfairly, from accidents that you had no apart of to illnesses that struck you down, or maybe you haven't had a fulfilled life or you still have regrets, the darklands is a place not that far researched even among the supernatural divisions of the couriers and all of this is pure assumptions and theories. One thing though is that possible conditions that doesn't allow you access when you die is, when your death was justified, suicide, and other similar terms. Yet again its just theory, but a plausible one. Another theory that seems to be confirmed is that people who survive the darklands are forgotten which seems coincides with other cases which leads to this, the development of darkland abilities. Darkland abilities are said to be related to their sin, strife, weakness or something they held very dear and at the same time they are given a curse. Killian is a prime example as he had received powers that are overwhelming, but he suffers continuously without end, both physically and spiritually, and he cannot die. But this entire thing is just a theory and it may be wrong as for the most part it has remained a mystery.

Rank 9: Ken Freedman
Description: Average height, slim, black hair, black eyes, pale. Wearing darkened/ weathered running shoes, jeans, navy-blue long-sleeve shirt and a weathered labcoat.
Nationality: Swedish
Weapon: Dark aura
Special: "Controlling" black flower aura
Fact: He hates the light, even before his infection

Move-set: Dark aura
-Dark aura rapture, a giant wave of dark energy spreads out in an all-around effect.
-Dark aura blast, a projectile of dark energy, can vary in both size, amount released in succession, and patterning
-Black blade, a blade made out of black aura what else can I say?
(From this point it is transformations as the fight goes on)
-Black wings, and he can fly...how delightful
-Bladed-tipped tail, that looks like it can hurt!
-Black swordsman, and...he turns into a crazy-looking fast dual-weilding swordsman...Well crap.

Backstory: Ken Freedman was a specialist of botany. He would usually combine different types of plants to create new breeds and would usually involve certain chemicals and cause unpredictable effects. Then suddenly one of his brothers was on the verge of dying from a disease that couldn't be cured. So as an experiment he decided to use one of his mutated plants that, in theory, could cure him of his disease...well nether the less he was dead wrong. Not only did his brother mutate into a plant-like creature, but this creature had the ability to mutate human beings into grotesque creatures of a very dark nature with a spore-aura that grows from a flower that this thing makes/ was the original plant that was given to him.

In time this plant had spread throughout the entire town that these two lived in and it turned into a unholy land of darkness which is quite literal since a dark aura cloud has blocked all forms of sunlight. This phenomenon obviously attracted the attention of many people which the military came and blocked off all passageways and people who entered who were curious/ fight frenzied got curbstomped. (Which again at the time it was still blooming) Skipping all the details of the events that occurred in the town, a vaccine was created to combat the black aura, Ken was infected and his aura can only be suppressed (Which by now you could guess it's development) his brother was killed and this town is still a hell-hole with all military-type and anyone that can fight in general pulling out as with very few survivors.


Battleground: Quarantined dark zone city.
