Rank 8: Einya Pejaga
Description: Below average height, light-brown skin, long black hair (Partially braided), blue eye and a eye-patched left eye....The eye-patch is metallic and in the shape of a square. Wearing a black cloak with a mouth-mask, has on dark-blue cargo pants, grey long-sleeve shirt, and black sneakers. Also is wearing a bell and whistle around her neck.
Nationality: Indian
Weapon: She is carrying a customized desert eagle, simple knives, and needles.
Special: ‘Eye of the gods’
Fact: Despite the amount of observations, most of her abilities are quite relatively unknown. The move-set you are about to see is what these guys have gathered and speculated with some base and proof.

Move-set: There is a reason why it’s called the Eye of the gods
-Mental inference, messing with your ability to think or how you perceive things in which this move alone has sub-levels;
.Disruption of perception in time and space; For example, this person can cause an illusion where something is farther than it really is causing something like an endless hallway. Disruption of time can do something like making your mental function to slow down considerable and doing something like making a second to you be 5 days in real life or making the illusion that the person is teleporting when really it disrupts your mental processing.
.Mental nightmare; will cause you have anxiety, paranoia, and make you see things. Overall, it’s like sleep paralysis, but a heck of a lot worse.
-Paralysis, this person can freeze your motor functions or mental functions just by staring at your eyes.
-Mind reader, apparently she may be able to read your mind. This is bad because she could figure out your strategies or find information.
-Shattered mind, she can damage your mind so much that she can essentially delete parts of your memory or just cause you intense pain or make you ‘shut down’.
-Mind-jack, can mind control you...yeah enough said.

Backstory: Einya can be regarded as a problem child who was first sold off to human trafficking business ,to give her family money, who then sold her off to a science facility, which by the way it was different from those human experimentation that turned humans into living weapons of mayhem and destruction. This science facility was more along the lines of human augmentation in which it was the weapons department.

As you can see from here, that was successful which of course led it to become too successful the minute that they dropped some of their guard and Einya figured out what her power was and decided to use it. Another thing you can see is that she managed to escape.

Running, stealing, killing everyone that went after her until they stopped, she herself disappeared from the world and changed everything about herself. To survive, she stole or killed, and at one point she became an assassin which in the underground she gained massive fame and infamy at the same time.

Points of her life, there were many bad things about it and few good things. Those were made worse when those good things turned sour by something else. But, there were good things happen in her life, that alone is good enough.

Although…She isn’t alone in the world.

Battleground: You don’t find her, she finds you

Description: Tall, average build, short rust colored hair, forlorn blank golden-red eyes, semi-darkened-light skin that has a rust-like substance on it. Wearing old rusted golden-red armor with an old armored wolf mask and a red torn cape/ scarf.
Nationality: Unknown
Weapon: Red rusted ultra greatsword with a wolf-styled hilt and a red rusted greatshield that has a wolf emblem on it.
Special: Rust abilities
Fact: That ‘rust’ is not really rust, but something similar and it can also affect living things and non-metal substances. The ‘rust’ can be removed with salt-water...or salt in general. Also if he was in his prime, he would annihilate you.

Move-set:
-Passive: Rust fog, there is always ‘rust’ coming from the person himself. What this rust does is that when bullets are coming toward him, the effectiveness of those bullets become reduced and their damage is significantly reduced. This also applies to bladed weaponry in which their edge dulls and blunt weaponry become weaker.
-Rust breathe, breathes out a stream of rust in which not only does it reduce the durability and effectiveness of your current equipment, it also slows you down and may also blind you.
-Rusted edge, his sword can render most defenses to shambles and reduce their effectiveness and durability. Though not all at once, it will do it with enough attacks. Also the damage alone…
-Roar of rust, he yells inhumanely and a full AOE rust attack comes forth
-Old swordsmanship, despite his appearance, his sword style is nothing to laugh at. It involves a fair amount of heavy strikes and severe spinning attacks. If he wasn’t so rusted he would be more agile and his skill set would be more open to destroying you.
-Shattered armor, when his armor falls apart you see his real form. Warning, he becomes faster than he was before, meaning prepare for the final act.


Back-story: Randolph is no mere-human. He is simply a humanoid machine created specifically as a guardian for a certain important person. Combat-wise, Randolph was a force to be reckoned with as his strength was incredibly high, his speed was quite amazing, and his durability and resilient were ridiculous. But that is not what set him apart from others; What made him different was that the creator had given him the ability to feel emotion. This was both an experiment and a lesson to see what would occur, and what happened was a success; both the guardian and the person under guard (By the way, it’s a female) had grew up. But…There were complications and human fear…

Due to paranoia and fear combined with what Randolph was capable of, he was separated from the one he had protected for a long time. The creator had disappeared, never to be seen again or heard of again by anyone, and Randolph was afflicted with a counter to his abilities and was left in a wasteland known as ‘The graveyard of machines’.

Battleground: The graveyard of machines
Fact for the area: This graveyard was built around a large experimental spaceship that had crash landed in a large desert. Though it’s a place where one could get good loot, it’s also a dangerous place with hostile robots and vise versa which is why it has mostly been left untouched by anyone of higher power. Though that doesn’t stop scavengers from hunting in the area, but be sure to see that there are bodies everywhere.

Nationality: Greek

Move-set: *I can't see crap and I just bumped into a rock wall*
-Area change: Hurricane, reduces visibility and incoming random objects!

Backstory: Eliza is an esper with atmokinesis, the ability to manipulate weather with one’s mind. When she was a child, she had absolutely no control over her abilities and it came out when she experienced massive emotional stress…or just strong emotions in general. Due to this, and as you can tell from how fear drives people to do things, she was taken away by the government, what a surprise there, but at least it was justified…It was just that their actions were more questionable…

To be studied, utilized as a weapon, gain more knowledge and vice versa, she did not have a good time, but when that kind of stress becomes pent up over the years, you will see the face of hell itself…
…
…
In the time she became 13, she had escaped the scientific facility that held her by absolutely wrecking it in the pure fury of mother nature. Running is all she did, with it came a storm of sadness and rage coming along with her. That is when she encountered Sigmund Freud (This is actually Gavin Von Landestat In the original character set...he was Ranked #7. Note this was before Battling 101 even existed in the first place so that piece of information became obsolete) Sigmund was a scientist that was the best and finest mind in the field of gravity (In which he is the main reason why gravity weaponry, incredible gravity control and vice versa, exists) when he first discovered Eliza it was a discovery based on curiosity and prediction and due to the circumstances, the first time they met it didn’t go well, but that piqued his interest further.

After much chasing and talking, Eliza miraculously went with Sigmund and ended up living with him. In those days, let’s just say that it was sunny days, but in the end it was a downpour…

Move-set: If you rely on supernatural and science to much you are royally screwed right up your buttocks.
-Hammer of breaking, the hammer turns black and will not only knock you back hard, but also reduce the effectiveness of your defenses.

-Destroy: can destroy matter...enough said


Backstory: Though he was extremely underground and he was not known throughout, those who did know knew him as the ultimate offensive weapon against people who had supernatural and high-tech powers, and other things. Even without his powers, he had great skill in his fighting ability and could easily give even the best a challenge by raw skill. But then, his story truly begins. He was hired by someone to be the guardian of Yukiko, when she was 5 years old. He was never informed of her potential power and so he wasn't prepared for what had befallen him. Before we reach that let me say this: *Insert long bonding time and adventure for about 8 years* Now onto how he got into his predicament when they entered the gallery...

Yukiko was the daughter of Lixue Yomohiro, who had several reputations both underground, above-ground, and with other rankers but that is for another time. Anyhow she had disappeared and under consent of the people around her, Mosianarre ended up in the mix as apparently they couldn't get anyone else who was a badass to look after her. The best way to describe her time with Mosianarre can be easy described with this: "At first this man scared me, I didn't know who he was. But after being with him for so long I found out he had a heart and he was a better man than what he appeared to be"
And this is Mosianarre from his side view with how he spent his time, "Yeah, the child is sweet and all, but how does one little child cause all of this misfortune and trouble!? DAMN! Ah, at least this is interesting...I honestly didn't expect this"
Well, that all changed after the art gallery mishap...

Okay I've been mentioning the art gallery and this is what it's correlation is to both of them. When they were examining the fine arts, Yukiko had found an interesting painting. The painting had two sides of it, one being an area of gloom and doom and darkness all over with a hint of limbo and the other being magical girl fuel with light and happiness for everyone and nyan cat pooping rainbows. Well needless to say, a certain power of hers activated and Mosianarre didn't have time to counter-act the effects so both ended up being sucked into the painting which made an entirely different dimension.

In this dimension it was two sides of the same coin and yin-yang. Mosianarre was stuck in the equivalent to limbo while Yukiko was in paradise. After surviving his hellish nightmare in his part of the dimension he made it into the other dimension where as he couldn't move Yukiko from her spot since she was experiencing her paradise that she didn't want to end. And before you ask, he didn't want to ruin her fun because his main job was not only to protect her, but to also keep her happy, which one of his abilities kind of supported his decision, also he really didn't want to see the aftermath when he pulls her out...Seriously have you see her move-list? She could literally end the world if Mosianarre was MIA.

Also, they aren't completely isolated from the world they have left nor are they away from each other that much. They actually do interact with each other and are still quite close. Also there are people that have the abilities available to enter their domain and both of them can interact with the world they left in certain ways. For example: Yukiko can enter dreams and Mosianarre can enter hearts. There has even been notices where people were dragged into their worlds unwittingly.

Also another fact: Some rankers do have a relation with both people here.

Battleground: Darklands/ Painter World/ Another f'n dimension which the guys who found this got curbstomped in 1001 different ways.
1413322.title: 2: Painted World 1: Dark Land

142.content:
Character: Vincent Warota
Description: Average height, slight build, short black hair, black eyes, and very pale. Wearing black long sleeve T-shirt, black cargo pants, black gloves, and black boots.
Nationality: ??????
Weapon: Carbon blades (Essentially they could count as shields...very good shields...and very good blades!)
Special: Amazing counter/defensive fighter
Fact: Vincent was originally the main character of battling 101, but that changed after many story changes.

Move-set: Essentially if you compare him to Mossianarre Blank (Rank 1) He is the best counter to ranged and physical attacks.
-Kinetic rebound, with certain blades of his, if they receive enough damage he is able to release the energy built inside those specific blades and shoot out a powerful shockwave that launches the amount of power made on that blade, but with more power.
-Carbon equipment: Not only are his weapons very hard to destroy, so is his equipment. His equipment is made out of very flexible carbon nano-tubing and other material that make this clothing as akin to high-grade armor that one would not laugh at.
-Reflection, with all weapons he is able to reflect back bullets and attacks.


Story: Odd thing about Vincent. There is literally no information available about his entire person whatsoever. There is no medical records, no school records, no relatives, nothing, its like he was created out of thin air. Although there has been people who have been like this, those people are few and far between. Many speculate if Vincent is even human considering of all of the human experimentation and heck there is even a person that is a clone and another who is a living bio-computer. Who knows who this person really is, but if there is one thing that is known is that he is good at what he does. Though these days no one knows where he really is, but what can be sure is that he is a force to be reckoned with.

Quick note: This person bares quite a resemblance to a certain person, although this is just in writing, he does look like a certain someone.

Battleground: ?????
142.title: Counter-Tactics

1421.content:
Character: Kazuya Shimanouchi
Description: Below-average height, slim, black short hair, black eyes, and white. Wearing a black long-sleeve shirt with white markings that resemble wings, black pants with white stripes going down it, black generic shoes, black gloves, a black and white bandana wrapped around his head, and he has a large quiver of swords on his back. Also he has spare sheathed blades on the sides of his waist.
Nationality: Japanese
Weapon: Jet sword (A special type of blade that has a propulsion jet inside it's hilt)
Special: Unique fighting style and an inhuman amount of reflexes.
Fact: Three things: 1:Yes, he is Katana Shimanouchi's brother 2: He was THE original number 9th ranked. 3: He is one of the few people, if not, the only person that has mastered the jet-blade to it's fullest possible potential.

Move-set:
-Blade rider, he has enough balance and control to actually ride his jet sword
-Sword projectiles, he can use his blades as projectiles, which is not surprising
-Jet close-combat, relating to his fighting style, his jet swords can quickly turn on and off, resulting in very quick stabs and sometimes enabling unpredictable fighting patterns and giving enough propulsions to do acrobatics in his sword-play.
-Sword-launch, he can shoot out the swords in his quiver like a gun or cannon, which you will either be impaled or knocked off balance depending on how is he shooting it.
-Blade flying, essentially like blade rider...except that he is using his jet-swords to actually fly...because screw you that's why.
-Sora no neppū no sutoraiki, essentially his ultimate which requires two things, 1: The opponent has to be in the sky 2: Blade flying and Jet-close combat must be in effect. This move is extremely dangerous and may result in serious injury or death to the user, using jet-blades to it's full power on both the attacking blade and flying blade, a giant combo of blade strikes is unleashed while going downward by gravity, with this it causes a type of wind disruption and when it hits the ground a giant spiral of wind strikes the ground with strong force that the surrounding area is slashed apart. The problem with this is that this is with the amount of force the body is put through and with the initial and aftershock strike of it which may cause instant death. This is a last resort.

Story: Kazuya was regarded as one of the strongest assassins in the underground. Considering the family he belongs to, he would be a shame to his family name if he wasn't. Overall he disliked the assassination business because he keeps getting fame and infamy from many and one of these days it will kill him and the people around him, and, in some cases, those people who don't have honor among assassins would usually go for his family members, but due to their reputation they could only go for one target, his little sister Katana that he loved dearly because everyone else in his family is a massive douche and follows the family code too closely.

Many, many times would there be some sort of attempt in kidnapping or killing and it would be Kazuya to be there to protect her. Unfortunately he can't be with her 24/7 so, with his connections, he contacted some old friends to act as bodyguards for his sister when he was away. Which with the amount of time spent with each other *Insert friend-bonding time* it had solidified their position as bodyguards to friends guarding each other.

But here arrives the question, why is it that Katana had taken Kazuya's spot as the 9th best fighter in the world? Well, that question can be answered on the day where everything had changed which considering the day that it had occurred it really was emotional. The day of Christmas eve...well...I guess you can say...it was a black Christmas indeed. What happened that day can be explained later on.

Battleground: ???????
1421.title: Jet-blade master

14211.content:
Character: Grey Dusha
Description: Average height, average build, colorless (Pure grey) hair, grey eyes, and grey skin. Wearing gear similar to riot gear, except it is colorless (All grey again!)
Nationality: Ukrainian
Weapon: Specialized M4A1 Assault Rifle
Special: Clones and the closest to an immortal you are going to get.
Fact: His clones have two varieties, those that are 'ashes' and those who are 'glass'

Move-set:
-Firing squadron, a quick smoke cloud appears and a firing squad comes out guns blazing.
-Passive: Body of ashes, whenever he sustains damage there would be a cloud of dust/ashes that emerge instead of your typical blood. This man's body is not like anything you have seen before.
-The army of the shattered body and soul, essentially why he is called the 1 man army, a giant group of soldiers come from all angles and in every direction. It's rare that anyone would see this move, and almost impossible to survive...unless you're immortal.
-The imperial soul, he 'changes souls' as his character reverts back to some warrior or fighter from the past...which expect melee guys everywhere.

Story: One of the many human experiments created in the past, this is one of the people that were actually successful and was one of the most dangerous among them. During the 'human weapon incident' that changed the world forever it was unfortunate that this monster was unleashed from his prison...But this guy was different as he only attacks when attacked and you can literally just go up to him and have a chat with him, just don't attack him and you'll be just fine...Unfortunately there are some people who are idiots and attacked him...Yeah...Quite unknown where he is now, but it has been said he is back in the underground because no one definitely saw him in a long time.

Battleground:???????
14211.title: The 1 man army

1422.content:
Character: Rhodes 'Red' Rose
Description: Short, average build, medium length black hair, green eyes, white. Wearing brown shoes, khaki cargo pants, and a long-sleeve red and white shirt.
Nationality: Canadian
Weapon: Customized crutch-rifle and crutch blades. Both individualized weapons and only resemble crutches slightly.
Special: Momentum-style fighting technique
Fact: Was once going to be ranked, but then removed for the sake of plot story.

Move-set:
-Quick weapon swap, very quickly change between his crutch-gun with his crutch blades, deadly for combos.
-Gun-jump, using the momentum from the kick-back of his gun, he can use this as a dodging maneuver or part of a combo
-Blade-jump, slash his blade back quickly, launching him forward to slash his enemies.
-360-blade dance, spinning around with his blades to prevent anyone or slash anyone too close


Story: Axel Rose was a man who really didn't have a single care about life. Though with the amount of times he had been outside instead of inside he had little to no friends, he had no one to go to for any kind of support when very intense things had occurred, and he has had broken hearts and betrayal's under his belt for quite a while so he just gave up on succeeding on life, though he wasn't suicidal, he just stopped caring what would happened and then that day came. It was nighttime and suddenly, when he was walking on the road, he was hit a drunk driver and was left incapacitated and debilitated.

When he was taken to the hospital he pretended to have lost his memory and he was diagnosed to have been crippled. Although he had completely recovered in his other parts he chose to hang around the hospital for personal reasons. He refused to take a wheelchair because "Sitting on my ass all day is not how I want to spend the rest of my life that I don't give a damn about" and somehow from another source he now carries his crutch weaponry...for self-defense purposes of course.

Also if you're wondering how he handles his gun and blades even though both his legs are unusable, well...he has practiced to deal with it, his weapons are specifically designed to be less of a hassle, and for the gun..."Sure I'll get on my knee's alright...so that I can shoot you while I'm down here!"

Battleground: Hospital
1422.title: The momentum fighter

1423.content:
Character: Clemmons Paragos
Description: Tall, skinny, short black hair, blue eyes, paler than the color white. Wearing very odd black mask with a slit for seeing, purplish-black long-sleeve shirt with blue crystals growing out the back, black pants, shoes, and gloves.
Nationality: ????? Is this man even human?
Weapon: Two red curved swords and many tools of mind trickery and bull-flop.
Special: Master of illusion, deception, mirage, and disguise.
Fact: I had no clue where to even possibly put this guy

Move-set:
-Smoke and mirrors, mirror, mirror, on the wall, who is the real man of them all? Watch your back to the mirror, it might be the real one.
-Mind trickery, something smells weird, everything seems to be bending and disorienting, what is going on? What did you do to me? And when were there 8 of you?
-Hypnotism, I don't think I know what I'm doing, everything seems to be going wrong...I'm stabbing Clemmons, but I feel a sharp pain in my stomach.
-Environmental change, it appears the air conditioner is broken, it seems hot all of the sudden, now it feels cold, now I am slipping on the ground.

Story: Clemmons can be easily classified as this, an entertainer that was bored of the same old routine that he has been doing for many years, so as a first he decided to be a little bit...rough with his audience. This...roughness had turned into a blood bath as everyone had eventually killed each other and Clemmons had made his escape. Did he enjoy it? Yes he did. Was he mentally bent? Probably. Was he ever caught? No he wasn't, if anything he had disappeared since then, but news has spread of his appearances during train rides and the eventually slaughter that came afterward. Watch it when you ride the train, it might lead to hell.

Battleground: Train
1423.title: The deceiver

14231.content:
Character: Saico "The Genocider" Saiga
Description: Tall, slim, medium-length white hair, red eyes, pure white (Albino). Wearing a black cloak with black-purple shirt, black jeans, gloves, and shoes.
Nationality: Japanese
Weapon: Two blood-red Katana's and a jet-black Zweihander.
Special: KILLING EDGE
Fact: His kill count is in the millions.

Move-set:
-Blood-Frenzy, his eyes glow red and he becomes physically stronger in all categories.
-Armed with blood wings, growing wings of a demon and quickly slash down everything in his path like they are nothing.
-Red damnation, slaming his blade into the ground and causing a giant release of red energy to spread in a large area.
-Ravage, clash his own blades together and release a multitude of slashes that goes in all directions.
-Curse of the demon, a legendary effect if hit with his zweihander and actually live, people who are afflicted with this have been known to have changed drastically over a short time. They go into an uncontrollable rage and destroy everything in their path until they are restrained or killed.

Story: Saico was the result of one of the many military experiments that had taken place to create human weapons. As you can see that experiment was successful...too successful. While still under surveillance he managed to break out of the underground facility that he was being held in, but not without slaughtering everyone in his path. Later on, due to the experiments done to him, his mind had slowly begun to alter and become extremely twisted, his heart was blackening, he was beginning to develop a blood lust that was going to be well-known, his thirst for fighting had grown very far and so he had begun one of the biggest slaughters ever done by one person. How this slaughter looked like? Well...it could be easily explained by these *insert scenes here*
*Insert scene of an entire city burning*
*Insert scene of a gigantic pile of bodies, both military and civilian, with Saico standing at the top laughing maniacally*
*Insert scene of Saico killing soldiers in the droves*
*Insert scene of Saico fighting a very powerful fighter, but then kills them*
Because of this man (For the most part, as there were others) was the reason the battling 101 had even begun, which it had started as 10. Because of this man had many people lives have been lost and changed forever. Because of this person, some of these people we see who are ranked and others who are unmentioned, are strong as they are now.

How this entire incident had fleshed out and ended can be seen at another time or be speculated.
14231.title: The genocider

info.brief_description: A world where the strongest survive, 101 of them are recognized as the strongest

Rules:
1. Blood and gore may be available to usage. Amount of usage has to be realistic though.

3. Use good grammar or you would have to fight the ranked people who are grammar nazi's
4. You can kill ranked people
5. You can skip this giant list of characters/descriptions of ranked fighters...seriously this is for organization use.

Don't confuse regular couriers with these couriers, there is actually a giant significant different IE They look nowhere near like regular couriers. Also the reason why they are called couriers is for this reason only "Skilled fighters who's main directive is to search and scour for people who are strong and skilled and give them a message" - The one who created it

Please note that everyone in this story is more durable than you think (Though there are still limits). The reason for this is not only for their sake, it's also for your character's sake (Look at some of these people's weapons and you'll know why)
